description: On Calle Manuel Lasala in the neighborhood next to Parque Grande Miguel Labordeta. The House is a semi-attic with a terrace on the ground floor of 30 square meters, on the tenth floor. It has a garage space and large storage rooms in the same building. House of 63 useful square meters, distributed in a hall with a built-in wardrobe, two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom, with a terrace and direct exits from the living room (the terrace has a pergola). The main bedroom is spacious and has a closet. Bathroom with window. Elevator at ground level. Totally Outside. Individual heating and hot water, it has a Split type air conditioning unit in the living room. Community fees are not high. The house is close to the Center, 20 minutes from Plaza Aragón and next to the main avenues of the city, with very good communications, in turn, it is next to the main exits of the city, surrounded by green areas, Views of the park, Bus Stops, Tram, Ambulatory, Hospitals, Clinics, Supermarkets, Shopping Center, Schools and Institutes. The house has a security entrance door, the work is from 1973, wooden floors, bathroom with window. The kitchen with all the comforts has electrical appliances and a magnificent use, special emphasis on the magnificent terrace on the ground floor, with direct access from the kitchen and the living room. Very comfortable, sunny and really quiet house, with a spectacular terrace, with good views, in a good community surrounded by green areas. Garage space and storage rooms, included in the price. The floor of the house is parquet and is well preserved. The windows on the floor have been changed and are with climalit glass. The heating is individual. On the terrace there is a storage room of about 7 square meters. If you need financing, you can contact us, we will help you and put you in contact with the main financial entities. Financing subject to solvency criteria of future buyers.

description: We present you the unique opportunity to acquire a triplex with a terrace on Avenida de América, in Torrero, Zaragoza! This triplex has a privileged location, in one of the most requested and growing areas of the city. With easy and close access to the main services and points of interest, this home is an ideal option for those who seek convenience and comfort in a quiet and familiar environment. On the first floor of this property, you can enjoy a spacious living room-kitchen, which offers a perfect space to share with family or friends, and enjoy a delicious meal or a good movie. In addition, this space has large windows that allow the passage of natural light, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. On the second floor, which is accessed by beautiful spiral stairs, is the master bedroom, which is spacious and bright, creating a calm and relaxing environment for rest. In addition, on this same floor, there is also the main bathroom, which has an excellent distribution and quality finishes. On the third floor, you can enjoy a large terrace of more than 30 meters, which is ideal for organizing meetings, barbecues or simply to enjoy the sun and the fresh air in a private and exclusive environment. As if this were not enough, this house also has a huge storage room, offering additional space for storage and organization. If you are looking for a property with extra space to store your belongings, this is the perfect option for you. Unfortunately we don't have a floor plan, but if you manage to get one, it would be great to get a better understanding of the layout of the property. And last but not least, this triplex also has the option of purchasing a garage for an additional price of 25,000 euros, which allows you to park your vehicle safely and comfortably. The sale price of this triplex is 138,000 euros, including the storage room. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a property in one of the most sought-after areas of Zaragoza, with all the comforts and services you need at your fingertips. If you are interested in obtaining more information about this property, do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Barrio Torrero, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida América

description: SPECTACULAR SINGLE FAMILY HOUSE WITH PRIVATE POOL FOR SALE IN ZARAGOZA. ON THE ROAD TO JUSLIBOL, NEXT TO SALVADOR ALLENDE. This beautiful four-story house with a garden and pool is located very close to the center of Zaragoza, and is also very well connected to the rest of the city by several bus lines. It is distributed over four floors facing East and West. Upon entering the house, the first thing we find is a beautiful porch with benches. Next, we enter the first floor where there is a fully equipped kitchen with electrical appliances, a bathroom and a large and spacious living room with access to the garden and pool through two large doors, a perfect place to relax and enjoy the outdoors. On the second floor of the house there are four bedrooms and two bathrooms. The main room is a suite with a bathroom. All are bright and spacious, plus they have plenty of natural light. On the top floor, there is the attic, a space that receives a lot of sun and that can be used as a study, work area or even as a games room. Finally, in the basement are the cellar and the garage with capacity for two vehicles. The cellar of this house is a spacious and cozy space, designed to enjoy the best moments surrounded by family and friends. It has individual city gas heating, ducted air conditioning, ceramic floors on the ground floor and cellar and parquet on the first floor and attic. In short, this house is an ideal place for those looking for a quiet life, in a very quiet residential area within the city, with open and spacious spaces where you can enjoy the people you love the most. The pool and garden are an oasis in the middle of the city. Do not miss the virtual tour that you can see in this ad, you will have the feeling of walking through your next home! Call us to arrange a visit, you will love it!

The first floor is distributed in 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom suite has 17 m2, two built-in wardrobes and its own bathroom. From it there is access to an exterior and independent laundry room, with its washer and dryer, very useful to avoid having to go down and up the clothes to wash on other floors. The other two bedrooms are very bright, ideal for children, with their built-in wardrobe and area to play or study. These two bedrooms have their own bathroom. The attic is a 30 m2 space with a bathroom and two open terraces. An area of the multipurpose house to make a study and a guest room, play area or whatever you need. And finally the cellar with a fireplace and a great space to get together with friends, or for your children to have a large and comfortable play area. The cellar has a kitchen with hob, hood and water well and a closed storage room. A chalet with only €40 for a community fee, two minutes from the Montecanal pools where you can enjoy paddle tennis, a social room, sports courts and of course, the pools, which you can go to in flip-flops from your chalet. description: LUXURY APARTMENT FOR SALE IN ZARAGOZA. IN RESIDENTIAL PARADISE. This impressive 241 m2 built apartment, of which 220 m2 are useful, is located in RESIDENCIAL PARAISO, located next to the Corte Inglés in Sagasta. With six bedrooms, four bathrooms, a large office-style kitchen and a spectacular 41-square-meter living room, this apartment offers an amount of space and comfort that is difficult to match in the center of the city. It also has a 22 m2 terrace that is accessed through the living room and a bedroom with views of the urbanization and the Corte Inglés and another 16 m2 interior terrace with access through the kitchen. The building has all the comforts you would expect from a luxury residential, including a lift from ground level, video intercom and a physical doorman who makes sure that everything is in perfect order. In addition, the farm is very well cared for and maintained, so the neighbors can enjoy an exceptional quality of life. The location of the apartment is another of its strong points, since it is located in the heart of Zaragoza, with all kinds of services within easy reach. From shops and restaurants to schools and health centers, everything you need is just a step away. In addition, the apartment includes two parking spaces and a storage room, located in the basement of the building and accessible through the elevator. This added convenience will allow you to forget about parking problems in the city center and enjoy greater peace of mind and security. The heating and hot water are central, it has air conditioning through ducts throughout the apartment. In addition, it has five built-in wardrobes and two storage rooms inside the apartment so that you can organize your belongings in the best possible way. The apartment is located on the first floor of the building, and its condition is original, well preserved. In any case, it is a unique opportunity to acquire an exceptional home in one of the best urbanizations in Zaragoza. Don't let him get away! Do not miss the virtual tour that you can see in this ad, you will have the feeling of walking through your next home! Call us to arrange a visit, you will love it!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Sagasta, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Residencial Paraíso

description: Splendid townhouse in Miralbueno of 190 m2 useful. Gated community. Four-storey townhouse, with a splendid 26.50 m2 cellar with a beautiful fireplace, a cellar designed and decorated by Artemark, with excellent qualities and materials. Ground floor of 55 m2, with a large living room of 24.56 m2, kitchen of 8.97 m2 very bright and fully furnished and equipped with cabinets and top brand appliances, and independent bathroom of 3.77 m2, from the ground floor there is access to a beautiful private garden of 27.30 m2. First floor with four bedrooms, one of 10.43 m2, another of 10.15 m2, another of 8.35 m2 and another of 8.30 m2, all of them with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom of 3.73 m2 with tiled walls. and splendid qualities. Second floor with sloping ceilings of 34.05 m2 useful, with more spaces under the attic with fitted wardrobes, very usable, it has the possibility of making a toilet. Two large garage spaces in the basement, with access from the cellar. Dark oak laminate flooring in the bedrooms and living room and marble on the stairs, individual gas heating, air conditioning throughout the townhouse. Privileged location and with a very promising future around, with the development of the adjoining land.

address: Calle de Santiago Ramón y Cajal, 12
description: 53 homes with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms and penthouses with splendid terraces. All with storage room and garage space, with pre-installation for electric car charging. Different options with a common denominator: an extraordinary light that enters each room through the large windows. Homes with the best qualities: double laminated plasterboard, wardrobes dressed in textile finishing, equipped kitchens, fully tiled bathrooms.. . Comfortable interiors with maximum energy efficiency, with underfloor air conditioning and cooling with aerothermal energy, an installation that achieves a homogeneous temperature in a more sustainable, economical and environmentally friendly way. The shared spaces have been designed with interesting proposals: a gym, a gastrobar and a landscaped patio that is a small oasis, where you can connect with nature. Located at Calle de Santiago Ramón y Cajal 12, Conde de Aranda corner, in the historic center of Zaragoza. An exceptional location next to Avenida de César Augusto, a few minutes walk from Plaza del Pilar. An unbeatable situation that allows you to enjoy all the facilities: schools that cover all educational stages, health centers, supermarkets, shops, gastronomic, cultural and leisure spaces.. . A home next to all the points of interest in the historic center of Zaragoza, to be able to walk to Plaza del Pilar, Plaza de España, the Ebro river.. . Perfectly communicated with the whole city, by numerous bus lines and by tram. And connected to the outside of it by its easy and quick access to the N-330.

description: The home you are looking for in Zaragoza is this: an apartment located in the historic center of the city.Located on the second floor with an elevator and a terrace overlooking the Roman theater, this house is a great opportunity to live or invest in this coveted area of the Aragonese capital. This exterior floor with northeast and southwest orientation is perfectly distributed in its 159 m² built (126 m² useful).It consists of a spacious living room - dining room with access to a terrace, a kitchen - office equipped with the main appliances, four bedrooms (one of the rooms has access to a terrace, and another of them has an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower), a bathroom with walk-in shower and a toilet.Also, the house has community heating, fitted wardrobes and tiled and parquet floors.  Additionally, the building has adapted access for people with reduced mobility.  The street where this apartment is located is very lively and commercial as it is in the Old Town, where most of the historical monuments of Zaragoza are also located: the Basilica el Pilar, the cathedral of La Seo, La Lonja, the tower of La Zuda, the Roman walls or the newly renovated Central Market.In other words, just a few minutes walk from the property are practically all the most emblematic places in the capital. Although it is possible to walk to many places of interest, the property is also very well connected by public transport, as it is located a 5-minute walk from the Plaza España tram stop, has several BiZi public bicycle stations and has With several bus stops in its vicinity, corresponding to lines 21, 22, 32, 211, etc. Do not lose this opportunity! Call us and we will arrange a visit without any commitment. IF YOU BUY WITH TIKO EVERYTHING ARE GUARANTEES: - The best prices on the market: the sale price of our apartments is, without a doubt, one of the best on the market, since before buying them we carry out an exhaustive study of the value of the property, applying both our Tikoanalytics™ technology and the experience of our real estate experts. - With all the legal guarantees: before purchasing a flat, one of our architects carries out a technical study with more than 100 inspection points to make sure that everything is in perfect condition.We exhaustively review the property, the state of conservation of the building and common areas.We analyze the result of the ITE (technical inspection of buildings) and if there are possible works planned for the building. - No technical surprises: in addition to a technical review, all our apartments undergo a review by our legal department to ensure that the home does not have any burden that could be passed on to the buyer.Our houses are always up to date with the IBI payment and community fees, and have an energy certificate. Who is Tiko? Tiko is a Proptech company dedicated to buying and selling homes.This property is our property, so the deal is direct with us and you will not pay commissions.If you want to buy or sell your house, we offer you speed at a fair price and without complications.If you need to sell your house before buying another, do not hesitate to contact us: Tiko.

description: Residencial Parque Verde is a promotion of 24 vacant homes with 1,2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with garages in the basement included in the price. Its closed urbanization stands out with a private pool for the neighbors, a solarium and large recreation areas to enjoy all year round. In Residencial Parque Verde you can find ground floors with large gardens, large terraces on the middle floors and penthouses with magnificent terraces. Residencial Verde is located in a privileged enclave of the city, next to the new Green Corridor and the Parque del Oeste, away from the crowds and surrounded by green areas but with all the services at your fingertips, perfectly connected to the city center, The promotion is located in the Links, a few meters from Vía Hispanidad and the Madrid Highway. All homes have AEROTHERMIA, through radiant-refreshing floors, so you can enjoy maximum comfort in your new home, while achieving greater efficiency-energy savings and having more free space, compared to the traditional radiator system. , improving the possibilities of interior decoration.

description: PRIVILEGED LOCATION in Montecanal. For sale this INDEPENDENT CHALET located in the most prominent part of Zaragoza, since the location is a real gift, The district to which Rosales del Canal, Montecanal and part of Casablanca belong, is at the top of the wealthiest in the capital Aragonese and for this reason we can enjoy this impressive home with first quality construction. This neighborhood born in the 90s has grown in demography and services, and still continues to do so, having everything you need in services, shops, supermarkets, well-known restaurants, a pharmacy, a medical center, banks, sports centers, etc. In AVENIDA DE LA ILUSTRACIÓN nº31 we find this urbanization from the year 99 closed to public access with beautiful houses and chalets like this one. The farm has a 350m2 plot and 409m2 spread over 4 floors, a beautiful entrance PORCH, 2 glazed TERRACES and a fantastic GARDEN WITH POOL. Entering through the main door we see the spectacular completely open-plan dining room with large windows overlooking the intimate garden, next to it we find the bright kitchen that continues with the same windows and a closed terrace that leads to the side exit of the house, on this On the first floor we find a small toilet and the stairs to continue the visit to the house. On the first floor we have the rest area, two single rooms with views of the urbanization and a complete bathroom, in front of them a large master bedroom that enjoys an individual glazed terrace, a large EN SUITE BATHROOM and an incredible DRESSING ROOM that can make anyone fall in love. any. On the upper floor we can enjoy a beautiful, spacious, open-plan attic, with windows that occupy the entire front and skylights for ideal ventilation and light. In the lower part of this independent villa we find a spacious garage for 4 vehicles with windows, a storage area and a beautiful cellar with a fireplace, ideal for large family parties. The house has individual natural gas heating, air conditioning, electric shutters, automated doors at the main entrance and a garage. A LUXURY FOR THE SENSES, quality of life and wonderful neighborhood Do you want to visit it? Do not hesitate! Get in touch with As de Pisos by phone or email.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montecanal-Valdespartera-Rosales del Canal, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Avenida de la Ilustración, 31

description: Large duplex house of 225 m2 useful in one of the urbanizations with the most green areas of Vía Hispanidad. Next to Avenida Gómez Laguna and SuperCor de La Floresta, bus stop at the entrance of the urbanization, excellent communication and exits from the city. Distributed over 2 floors with five rooms: the main bedroom is 30 m2 plus a private terrace, 3 bathrooms, a 43 m2 living room, a 20 m2 kitchen-dining room. A lot of independence in all its rooms since two rooms are on the first floor together with the living room and the kitchen, and the other three rooms are on the ground floor. It is a house all exterior and with good qualities, susceptible to updating. Large number of perfectly lined fitted wardrobes, access to the ground floor through a comfortable staircase. Both heating and hot water are central with an individual meter. There is also installation of air conditioning. It consists of two parking spaces and a storage room as well as a private outdoor area to park vehicles. The urbanization is perfect for the whole family to enjoy with children, adolescents and adults. It also has green areas, swimming pool, tennis court, soccer field, children's area with swings and a basketball hoop. The community has a concierge.

description: Residencial Camellia Garden, the most exclusive promotion of Grupo Lobe. The exclusive Residencial Camellia Garden is made up of 96 extraordinary homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms plus spacious living rooms with large windows that will give natural light to the room and spectacular duplex penthouses with a double-height living room. It is projected to the south of Zaragoza, with the best communications to both the Ctra. Madrid and Avd. Gomez Laguna. Its proximity to the Canal Park, numerous Health Centers, sports and educational facilities, places this residential in an ideal place to live. The terraces of the houses will be very spacious, designed to become a perfect corner in which to disconnect and relax at any time of the year. The kitchens will be equipped with all electrical appliances, some will even have a work island providing greater storage capacity and ease of use. The built-in wardrobes in the homes will have interior cladding, and almost all homes include a spacious separate walk-in closet in the master bedroom. The qualities of the bathrooms are exceptional, with highly resistant and antibacterial paneling and shower trays, combined with modern design vinyl paper that will set a trend in the current concept of new housing. The residential will have a pleasant common area with walking areas where you can enjoy a swimming pool and a children's play area. The houses include a garage and storage room. This residential is a commitment to quality, sustainability and innovation. The homes will be certified under the Passivhaus standard, the most demanding in terms of energy efficiency, guaranteeing absolute comfort and quality of life. In order to offer a better performance of Passivhaus homes, the homes will include pack 2 of smart homes, a new system that adapts to needs, saving time in automated controls, in order to improve comfort, optimize savings and increase security.

description: “UTEBO Real Estate Agency Sells in ALTO LA MUELA, INDEPENDENT CHALET recently renovated. The Chalet of 194 m2 built according to cadastre, is located within the URCAMUSA Urbanization, on a 1082 m2 Plot. Perfect location on the outskirts of ZARAGOZA, which has both great tranquility and nature as well as very good communication to the city, about 20 minutes away. The house is divided into 2 floors, the ground floor being the main floor of the house. The ground floor has: A covered porch at the entrance a spacious kitchen, fully equipped with BRAND NEW appliances. 1 spacious living room that has pre-installation for a fireplace. An annex that could be both a living / dining room and another bedroom. 2 Full Bathrooms and an in-suite bathroom in the first bedroom. The first floor has 2 more bedrooms. In the Garden we find a large barbecue area (equipped with a built-in barbecue and a huge built-in table to comfortably enjoy the patio).Besides, it has a cistern of around 40 cubic meters, ideal for having clean rainwater for a swimming pool.The place where the pool could be installed is planned and has an outdoor shower with hot water and a toilet.It also has several storage rooms and storage spaces. Among the qualities and finishes of the house, it is worth highlighting: The quality wooden floors of both Oak and Elondo. The high-quality carpentry that attributes to the energy efficiency of the property and helps to maintain the temperature of the house both in summer and in winter. The house also has a pellet heating with a tank that feeds to the radiators of the whole house.One of the most effective and economical types heating. It also has pre-installation for air conditioning ready to arrive and connect the gadgets. It is a very exclusive home with a perfect location to enjoy tranquility and nature.It has many possibilities of adaptation to the taste of the buyer, such as the installation of the private pool and much more.In addition, the URCAMUSA urbanization has a large community space with a swimming pool, tennis courts, soccer field and a bar.With large garden areas. You will be able to take advantage of your time to practice outdoor sports, bike or run outings, family walks and enjoy pleasant baths in the pool, as well as outdoor barbecues and family gatherings. They will live in an ideal, familiar and natural environment. Request a VISIT WITHOUT COMMITMENT.We will be delighted to assist you. In the event that you need financing, we have our own financial department that will assist you in a personalized way and clarify any doubts that may arise. Calling the phone visiting our website or our office in Utebo, Calle Santa Teresa 29, Local ". We will look for your new home together!

description: Exclusive property located in the Torre Barajas Urbanization.Located 10 kilometers from the center of Zaragoza. A property of impeccable architecture, solid facing brick facade built on a plot of approximately 1,200m.Its interior is distributed in: Ground floor, we are greeted by a hall that connects us to a large 69m2 living-dining room with a fireplace, wide views of the garden and pool, and a 27m2 kitchen.From these rooms we can access the outside where there is a terrace to eat outdoors and enjoy the barbecue area.Also on the same floor to make life more comfortable, we have a 17m2 suite-type bedroom and a courtesy toilet. First floor, there is the night area with three double bedrooms with bathroom and fitted wardrobes, and the master suite of 26 meters with a bathroom of 13m2, all of them with large windows, making the rooms very bright and pleasant. From this floor we access the tower of the house, a space of about 30 meters that allows us to host our own corner, with great light and beautiful views. On the semi-basement floor we find the garage for three cars, cellar, toilet and a multipurpose room for leisure and sauna. The house was projected with excellent qualities, looking for a perfect distribution.A beautiful garden and its spacious swimming pool make the exterior of the villa magnificent.Accumulator heating, air conditioning and good enclosures make it a very comfortable house.It has a security system, an alarm inside the house and a perimeter alarm for the outside area of the Garden. Torre Barajas is perfect to establish your habitual residence, due to the high quality of life it guarantees, ideal to enjoy with the family, good communication with the city center and a stone's throw from La Torre Outlet shopping center in Zaragoza.

description: Great DUPLEX with garage and storage room in Puebla de ALFINDEN. VPO Housing (See Requirements) Good location, 20 minutes from downtown Zaragoza. It is a population that offers an excellent quality of life, with all kinds of services nearby, school, institute, shops, restaurants, medical center, pharmacy.. . LIVING IN A VILLAGE WITH THE COMFORT OF BEING CLOSE TO THE CITY! The house is located in a wonderful SEMI NEW CONSTRUCTION building built in 2011 with an elevator to level 0 and access through it to the basement where the garage and storage room are located. The distribution is SUPER and very comfortable, on the first floor we find a spacious entrance hall that opens to the left to the area of the two bedrooms, both large and with custom-built WARDROBES and a beautiful renovated bathroom. The main bedroom also has a balcony or glazed gallery with VIEWS TO THE MONCAYO. Entering through the Hall to the right, we find the beautiful dining room, connected by sliding doors to the large kitchen. A current space, designed to share and enjoy both united or separate rooms. The house enjoys a privileged NATURAL LIGHT in all the rooms, especially in the heart of the house, the spacious living room + kitchen. From the entrance hall there is access to the upper floor where we find another 2 large rooms, a complete bathroom and a beautiful outdoor TERRACE with BARBECUE. All rooms offer WONDERFUL VIEWS with LOTS of LIGHT. It is a very COZY home in an IMPECCABLE state to move into. The excellent materials with which the updates/reforms have been made guarantee quality of life and comfort. It has air conditioning through ventilation ducts, central heating with an individual meter, climalit windows, closing galleries to improve energy consumption. Furniture and all improvements are included. *Community expenses €77.59 *IBI €183.79 * VPO Housing - Buyer Requirements: -Do not own any home -Have a minimum income of €12,100 -If a single person buys, the annual income cannot exceed €40,500 -If 2 or more people buy, they cannot exceed €52,100 (To find out, you have to add the general tax base + tax base of savings from your income statement). If you want to live here, in a quiet environment with a high quality of life, call NOW to book your in-person visit. Also contact via WhatsApp (ANA) Follow our Instagram account: @ana_da_frutos to see more available homes.

description: From PROPISO we are committed to your new home! If you are one of the people who values the multiple advantages of living outside the busy life of the city of Zaragoza, we offer you a magnificent semi-detached house in Villamayor de Gallego. The house has an excellent distribution with a useful area of 175 square meters that is distributed over three floors plus another for a cellar. First floor: 23-meter living room with direct access to cellar and garden areas, large fully equipped 8-meter kitchen, and full bathroom; As complementary areas, it also has a 76-square-meter garden with a barbecue, a large cellar with a fireplace, and a 23-meter garage. description: From PROPISO we are committed to your new home! First floor: 28-meter living room with access to a 13-square-meter covered terrace, spectacular 15-meter kitchen fully equipped with storage area or pantry, 12-meter bedroom, and toilet; As complementary areas it also has an Andalusian-style family winery, a 27-meter garage with direct access to the house, and a storage area which was originally conceived for use as stables. Second floor: 4 double bedrooms of 12, 13, 13 and 14 meters respectively, the master bedroom has a large dressing room and bathroom en suite, also with access to an exterior balcony of 7 square meters; main bathroom of 5 square meters, and a second balcony of 14 meters, a real luxury. Regarding the outdoor areas, it has an open useful area of 286 square meters that is made up of a large paved garden that borders practically the entire house and an entrance area decorated with tiles and a planter. As distinctive elements we can highlight its geolocation, since it is located in one of the most central areas of María de Huerva and 20 minutes from the city; its excellent state of conservation and the constructive quality of the complex; its luminosity, thanks to its orientation and its large windows that allow natural light to enter practically all day; the absence of structural elements adjacent to the property that interfere with the views and the entry of light. Piped music throughout the house, hot-cold pump and heating system individualized by floor. The house dates from 1989 and the construction materials used in the house were classified as high-end. The winning offer is subject to approval by the vendor, who has a maximum of 14 working days to respond, in which case the offer will be binding.   Zaragoza is the capital of Aragon, a northeastern region of Spain next to the Ebro river.   It has a population close to 666,000. Subject property is close to the Church of Nuestra Señora del Pilar. Amenities in the area include supermarkets, schools, restaurants, pharmacies, bank branches, etc. Next Steps Click on the “additional link” below the map and it will take you to the property page where you can: Arrange a viewing | Access the legal documents | Make an offer | Contact our team directly We don’t charge commission to the buyer.

description: Buyer customer exempt from additional fees. For sale spectacular semi-new apartment, in Utebo, with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, three terraces, garage and storage room. Elevator. The apartment is tastefully furnished and ready to move into. One of the terraces completely closed with Lumón-type glazing, without profiles and can be fully opened. Kitchen with wall and base units, a beautiful orange glass table with chairs, with access to an interior terrace, and with all electrical appliances. The three bedrooms have access to the terraces, and stand out in them, some beautiful and spacious closets / dressing room. Beautiful master bedroom suite, whose bathroom is large with a bathtub and two closets. The other bathroom is large and with a window like the one in the suite, this one with a shower tray, storage cabinet, and sink cabinet in dark tones. address: Calle Paseo maria agustín 40-54 no number
description: We present "MARÍA AGUSTÍN 40", quality homes located in Paseo María Agustín nº 40-56, one of the historical places of Zaragoza. We are located in the enclave of the old Cavalry Barracks from which this project recovers part of its remains, making the building a direct member of our historical heritage. The project consists of a total of 114 homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with large terraces to enjoy the outdoors, the exterior views and where you will not lack sunlight due to any of the orientations that our new building offers you. Panoramic penthouses on the ground floor and duplex penthouses have also been designed where the spaciousness of their terraces or their solariums give added value to your home. The project is equipped with the latest technology in terms of heating and ventilation systems, by means of aerothermal machines and independent heat recuperators for each home; thus achieving maximum energy efficiency. The innovative façade with avant-garde design is striking, which also pays special attention to thermal and acoustic insulation. Another of the building's jewels is the top floor, where we have created a landscaped roof that includes an infinity pool, a gym and a large common-use solarium from where you can disconnect from daily obligations, without giving up the comfort of your home. We will also have a large commercial space, and large parking spaces and storage rooms. Parking spaces and storage rooms are not included in the prices, as there are different dimensions. Parking spaces from 22. € 400 + VAT and storage rooms from 4. € 600 + VAT.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Plaza de Toros, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Paseo maria agustín 40-54 no number

description: Impressive independent villa with land in the heart of Montecanal. It is located on Avenida de La Ilustración, one of the highest-level residential areas of the city. Characterized by its unbeatable facilities, its private security and its range of services. The house is located in a completely fenced area and equipped with 24/7 security systems. In addition, the uniqueness of its surroundings places it in one of the most exclusive residential areas of the city. Within the urbanization, the house is located within a completely independent and walled plot of more than 500 square meters. Inside, we can find a paradisiacal private garden with a completely independent pool next to the porch and the living room. The house, singular and avant-garde, gathers an unmatched architectural quality among its surroundings. It is made up of various geometric shapes that merge with each other, emulating the essential elements of nature. On the main floor, we find the independent kitchen with an island and fully equipped. It also has a toilet-type bathroom that gives access to the impressive three-story living room that appears in the photographs. On intermediate floors we find the master bedroom, with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room, along with two other secondary bedrooms with their private bathroom. In the basement, with direct access to the street, there is a completely independent apartment with also an en-suite bathroom and likely to be an appendage to the house. From the third height of the living room, where there is an office with views of the entire house, we can access a huge terrace on the upper floor, the same size as the house and with impressive unobstructed views. Finally, the house has all kinds of amenities and comfort: underfloor heating, home automation programming for the entire house, climalit windows, wooden and porcelain floors, automatic doors. If you are looking for a unique, independent and ultimately special house, do not hesitate to contact us.

description: Buyer client exempt from additional fees. In the heart of the Montecanal neighborhood, in the Parque de los Príncipes Urbanization, this semi-detached house is for sale. It is a construction of the year 2000, with a facing brick facade and excellent qualities and finishes. The floor of the main floor is white marble, with white lacquered wooden doors and windows, with a beautiful central staircase that runs through the 4 floors also in white wood, which gives it a lot of personality. On the floor of the rooms we have a warm wooden floor, and in the attic and cellar it is stoneware. It has heating with individual gas boiler, with independent circuit and thermostat on each floor. description: Fee-free buyer client.Great house in Villamayor de Gallego.The house has 462m2 built.It has a cellar, 6 bedrooms and a bathroom.The construction is from 1970.It is in good condition and an update can be made to enter to live.It is located in the best area of Villamayor and with all services available and just 10 minutes from Zaragoza.It is distributed over three floors, with lots of natural light and spacious rooms.The heating is from a diesel boiler with a 1,000 liter tank.The house also has an alarm.It has adjoining buildings, such as a cellar, garage, boiler room, shed and rooms for different needs.Villamayor de Gállego is a municipality located near the confluence of the Gállego and Ebro rivers with a rich past as an area of settlements from Roman and Muslim times.The Arab presence in the town is visible above all in the Loma del Pesebre watchtower and above all in the inherited tradition of taking advantage of water resources, as well as in an urban planning marked by palatial brick houses and the spectacular Mudejar tower of 1587 from the Church of the Assumption.We find the financing you need.

description: IT'S TIME TO MAKE DECISIONS ARE YOU LOOKING FOR HOUSING? We have this property, in one of the most consolidated urbanizations in Zaragoza, Fuente de La Junquera (Casablanca district), a magnificent four-story villa with an individual garden of about 70 m2 and a large terrace, with extensive views of the Huerva river, the house has a total of 381m2 built and 319 useful (according to cadastre) stands out for its large common areas such as swimming pools, basketball paddle tennis court, soccer, barbecues and large gardens with trees, good communications both by car, as a public service at the door, with access to the city ring roads. First floor, four large bedrooms, with three full bathrooms (2 of them suite) and the other two doubles, all of them with fitted wardrobes. Second floor, a hall that divides two spaces, one of them with a terrace, currently one is as a games room of about 35 m2 and the other as an office, gym and sauna of about 39 m2 This very well built property will make you enjoy all year round, with marble floors, good carpentry, ducted air conditioning, individual gas heating, all LED electrical system and mosquito nets throughout the house. Nearby schools, Europa, Montearagón, Sansueña, Marianistas and Sagrada Familia high schools. description: FOR SALE SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE WITH FOUR FLOORS, WITH TWO BEAUTIFUL TERRACES AND A DOUBLE GARAGE PLACE LOCATED IN ALFAJARÍN, ONLY 17 KM FROM ZARAGOZA. Semi-detached house in Calle Valle de Ordesa, Alfajarín, municipality of the Central Region of the province of Zaragoza. Part of its municipal area is occupied by the Sotos y Galachos del Ebro Directed Nature Reserve. Town provided with all kinds of shops and services for the use and enjoyment of the inhabitants and the surrounding towns. The property consists of 181m2 built and 143m2 distributed over four floors as follows: - Street level or ground floor: Large 22m2 living room with fireplace, 25m2 terrace, kitchen and bathroom with shower and natural ventilation. - First floor: 3 double bedrooms, two of them equipped with a spacious double built-in wardrobe and the main one measuring 13m2, a complete bathroom with a shower tray and natural ventilation and a distributor. - Upper floor or attic: Large 25m2 room that can be used as a fourth bedroom and/or office, dressing room, etc. , with access to a 15m2 terrace. - Basement: Double garage space and 17m2 cellar (currently used as a storage room-warehouse). Housing equipped with very good qualities in perfect condition to move into: Parquet and marble floors, windows with climalit tilt-and-turn glass lacquered in white with thermal break, low emission control, solid oak interior doors, armored entrance door, updated electrical installation and plumbing. Individual gas heating and hot water, ducted air conditioning in all rooms of the house (hot and cold pump), except in the attic where there is a split inverter also with hot and cold pump. All exterior with very good orientation (cross, which produces ventilation in the property apart from being very bright and sunny), and beautiful views of the mountains. Do not miss this opportunity if you want to live away from the city, noise, traffic, pollution, etc. You will gain peace of mind and quality of life by being in continuous contact with nature, without giving up the advantages of big cities either, since it is located just a few kilometers from the Aragonese capital.

description: Spectacular apartment with extensive views of the Gran Vía promenade with 4 double bedrooms, measuring 19.18, 12 and 10 square meters respectively with 2 full bathrooms with a bathtub, one of them in the main bedroom facing the promenade and the Rio Huerva area. Large fully equipped kitchen with high and low cabinets, and the respective appliances. Through it we have access to a spacious gallery with a glass enclosure. It is a fifth floor outside, therefore very bright. It has a terrace with access from the main living room and another very spacious one that is accessed from the kitchen to the farm's block patio. The apartment has central heating and hot water, as well as installation of ducted air conditioning in all rooms. Large built-in wardrobes, one of them in the hallway and the other in the master bedroom. A few meters from the tram stop, and with all the advantages of being in the commercial and financial center of the city. The farm has a concierge 24 hours a day, several elevators. It has 2 optional garages that are not included in the price. DON'T MISS THE OPPORTUNITY TO LIVE IN THE CENTER OF THE CITY! Call us and come see it.

description: RESIDENTIAL ZIGURAT Impressive penthouse with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, with large terraces and top quality finishes. In the best area of Miralbueno, Residencial Zigurat is a private urbanization with a unique garden design in the city. Conceived and designed as a work of art, it integrates living areas, a solarium, a playground for children, two swimming pools and a representative sculptural monument. It is an ideal place to live, with all the possibilities at your fingertips and without moving away from the comforts that the big city offers you. Next to Zaragoza's Green Belt, in an area with large green areas and sports facilities. Very close to shopping centers, supermarkets, schools, nurseries, health centers, senior centers, pharmacies, etc. The house is built under high energy efficiency standards, achieving the highest rating possible today "A". You will enjoy the most advanced technology for heating and cooling rooms, combining excellent insulation, windows with thermal bridge break, aerothermal energy, underfloor heating and cooling, and an air renewal system with heat recovery. Thanks to these systems, we save a lot of energy without sacrificing comfort. All the materials chosen are of the highest quality and the constructive solutions have been carefully studied to guarantee great thermal and acoustic insulation. This is further reinforced by having interior partitions in ceramic brick. It is delivered with fitted wardrobes in the hall and bedrooms. The interior equipment is from the Porcelanosa group and the Bosch brand appliances, which will give your home a premium and exclusive image. The house we offer you is top quality and fully equipped to become your new home. Contact us! Grades: - Start of works last quarter 2022, approximate completion mid-2024 - Prices include parking space and storage room. Second parking space optional. - VAT not included.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Miralbueno, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Alberto Antonio Mustienes Luesma, 17

description: MAKE A FIRST VISIT WITH OUR VIRTUAL TOUR!   There is nothing like having light and silence,  The moldings, the floor, the doors, the light, I don't know, everything, can be the winner of this game. really special are these rescued old details combined with a good reform, it's beautiful. The great height of this floor fascinates me. I think of all the apartments in which I have lived and despite being all very different, I always tried to find a quiet corner. One day I know that I will move to a place very similar to this flat, I know, but in the meantime I am getting the best out of the flats I go through, selling and decorating them, finding those nooks and crannies that are so special that one feels. I am delighted to show them to you during the visit!  This little apartment is a 2nd floor, but as if it were a room since the property has a Street and Ground floor. It has 166 m2 built, with lots of light and very quiet. The living-dining room joins the large entrance hall that the house has, accessible through a double door. At the entrance there is a large closet to store coats and street accessories. A large window that provides natural light and a room with access to a balcony overlooking the main street. Continuing down the corridor we find one of the 5 rooms that the house has, nowadays conditioned as an office. Next to it is the fitted and wooden kitchen. We continue with the corridor and find the rest of the rooms, two equipped bathrooms: One with a bathtub and the other with a shower. The bedrooms with lots of afternoon light, perfect for the little ones to study with natural light! The house is divided into three bedrooms, one of them with a balcony, 1 bathroom with a window, an independent kitchen and a living room. We are talking about a house located in a unique and strategic area at a residential level and one of those that are hard to find since the owners of these houses know of their great value, this house has a built area of 69m and 65m useful in which they can capture your best ideas and thus make it your ideal home. The house is oriented to the East, so we can enjoy the sun during the morning, at the same time it is perfectly ventilated thanks to its distribution. The house is well located in the area with the best transport communications in the city; It also has a multitude of nearby services such as bars, restaurants, pharmacy, tobacconist, supermarket, credit institutions, etc. At the Núcleo agencies we will carry out a free valuation of your flat, house or property, according to the reality of the current real estate market. description: BIARRITZ-inmo: Would you like to have your house next to Parque Delicias? And that it is close to shops and all services? Well, surely you will love this house with three bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom and a small terrace on Hnos. Gambra, next to Vía Universitas and very close to Avenida Madrid. We already know that parking is very bad everywhere, so your garage will be the icing on the cake. It has central heating and hot water, sapele-colored interior carpentry with an armored door at the entrance, wooden exterior carpentry with a shutter in the master bedroom, terrazzo floors throughout the house (except kitchen and bathroom, which is stoneware), terrace from where to hang out if you want and with a wardrobe with aluminum doors, bathroom with window, video intercom, kitchen with double access, split in the living room and a large built-in in the master bedroom. The garage space is spacious and comfortable and has direct access by elevator. The house is interior but very bright due to its large block patio and the lights, the orientation is northwest and it has great cross ventilation. It is the fourth floor in a nine-storey farm, with four neighbors per floor and built in 1974. The "very showy" courtyard has resolved the architectural barriers and was recently renovated. The community cost is very adjusted to be central heating and hot water is metered. Its location next to Vía Universitas is one of its strong points and you have next to all the necessary services for a comfortable life, its large park with many green areas where you can take a break or walk your pet, as well as good urban transport communications, Delicias Station one step away and close to the exits of the city. It has a community cost of €104/month (including heating) and approx. 63 m2 of useful space. including the small terrace (you can ask us for more detailed plans). Do you want to make the purchase right? CONTACT US, WE WILL BE HAPPY TO SHOW IT TO YOU!

description: T-VRÈX is located in a perfectly communicated area, just a few minutes from the center of the city of Zaragoza and next to the emblematic Príncipe Felipe Pavilion and the Larrinaga Palace. The surroundings of Cesáreo Alierta offer all the services: educational centers, health facilities, leisure, services and restaurants, as well as easy communication with the public transport network and access to the main exit routes of the population. An incomparable and perfectly communicated environment to ensure the lifestyle you want for your family and for yourself. T-VRÈX is an efficient and comfortable residence in which the common area to which the promotion opens, has abundant natural light and includes well-kept green areas and a swimming pool. It has apartments on the ground floor with 2 to 4 bedrooms, all of them with a terrace to make the house expand towards the outside, it also offers Penthouses with large terraces. Inside, spaciousness and luminosity are sought, without neglecting functionality and aesthetics. The owners will enjoy a designer kitchen with high-capacity wall and base units that includes all electrical appliances, an induction hob with three burners and a quartz front. The perfect combination of modernity, quality, comfort and sustainability is the main hallmark of T-VRÈX. All this is added to the attention to detail inherent in Ebrosa developments, offering spacious and bright homes.

description: In Montecanal.Av.of the Enlightenment.Finding a special place to live is not an easy task, especially when it involves the whole family, but when you find it, it is comforting because you feel that it is your house, your home, your refuge, your special place in the world.We invite you to project yourself in this wonderful house with great qualities that you can customize to your liking to make it your home. The house has a total of 4 floors with the following distribution: - On the ground floor it has a/c at the entrance, a courtesy toilet with a window, a double bedroom with access to a large rear garden terrace, an office kitchen with a laundry room and access to the same terrace where you can spend pleasant mornings having breakfast surrounded by nature or sharing a dinner with friends. - In -1: Cellar with windows and a 350mm steel tube chimney.Solid oak stairs, garage for 4 cars, water tank, courtesy toilet and storage pantry.Details of ceramics from La Seo and the Torre de Utebo in the winery (by Fernando Malo). - First floor: * Bedroom 2 with a/c, wallpaper and exit to the Aragonese corridor-type terrace * Bedroom 3 with a/c and exit to the terrace * Full bathroom with shower * Bedroom 4, the main one, with several built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and a window.Exit to terrace overlooking the entrance garden - Attic: It has 2 fully equipped rooms, one as a large office with access to a solarium terrace that will be your haven of peace for teleworking, reading or for any family hobby; and a 5th bedroom. You'll like to know these details: Averly Cast Iron Gates Non-slip slate exterior floor Handmade arabic brick and tiles Galician non-slip paving stone in the entrance ramp to the garage Olive tree with certificate of origin (26 years) Arbutus tree in the back garden, lemon, orange, mandarin and muscatel vines from Murcia Averly cast iron sink, Alcañiz ceramic vases, Aluminum on the porch sills You can see it in detail by entering the Virtual Tour link.Do not hesitate to contact us to request more information or make a face-to-face visit.Talk later?

description: BRIGHT AND FUNCTIONAL HOUSING IN PARQUE MIRAFLORES. GARAGE IN FARM In Paseo Rosales, within the Parque Miraflores residential complex. Located in the center of the urban nucleus near several of the main arteries of the city. Next to Camino de Las Torres, Cesáreo Alierta, Tenor Fleta and Paseo Sagasta. Surrounded by all the necessary services, educational and leisure centers, and commerce of all kinds. With green recreational areas and playgrounds for children. Well connected by several urban bus lines. House of about 90 m2 on the middle floor, overlooking Paseo Rosales. Clear view, good orientation with morning-noon sun and no noise from car traffic. Well distributed with a spacious hall, a 21 m2 living room with access to a 6.5 m2 terrace, a kitchen of more than 8 m2 with a utility room, three good-sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, and another complete bathroom. Wooden floor, armored door and ducted air conditioning. Central heating with individual control and adjusted community fees. The price includes a garage space for a medium-sized car on the same property, with direct access. For more information and visits, ALIERTA.

description: You have always dreamed of living in a large house with an impressive garden and also your private pool! Do not miss the opportunity to visit this farm: It is in the Virgen de la Columna urbanization, it is located 18 minutes (16 km) from Zaragoza and 1 km. of the Burgo de Ebro. It is an urban farm of 1077 meters of plot and 234 meters built, from the year 1988. The chalet is on one floor distributed in three large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, an independent kitchen, a spacious bathroom and a living room with a fireplace and unbeatable views of the large garden. It has air conditioning, and mosquito nets on all windows It also has a 90-meter basement distributed in a 55-meter cellar with windows and a 45-meter garage for several cars, as well as being able to use it as a storage room or workshop. The entire house including the cellar has oil heating. Enjoy in the garden, which has automatic irrigation with a LARGE SWIMMING POOL WITH LIGHTING, making barbecues with friends and family The farm has 2 water lines, one for drinking and the other for irrigation. The Virgen de la Columna urbanization is perfect to establish as your habitual residence, ideal to enjoy with the family, it has several green areas, playgrounds, a restaurant and a bus stop (line 310). If you want to visit it, call us at we adapt to your schedule.

description: The home you are looking for in Zaragoza is this: an apartment with great potential to reform to your liking (and without commissions), located in the San José neighborhood. Located on the first floor with an elevator and a few minutes from the city center, it is a great opportunity to live or invest in this coveted area of the Aragonese capital. This exterior apartment with double orientation (northwest - southwest), consists of 159 m² built and 127 m² useful. Currently, it is divided into a spacious living-dining room with access to a glazed terrace, a pleasant kitchen equipped with the main appliances and a utility room, which has access to a cozy interior patio, five bedrooms (one of the rooms has access to a terrace glazed), a bathroom with bathtub and two toilets (one of them en suite).   Additionally, the property also has central heating (community), climalit windows, parquet and terrazzo floors, fitted wardrobes and alarm. Also, the building has adapted access for people with reduced mobility and a doorman.   The house is located in a residential area with a lot of movement and is located just a few steps from the Pignatelli park, ideal for walking or playing sports, and from the Sagasta promenade. In addition, the neighborhood has numerous establishments of interest such as supermarkets, health centers, educational centers such as the María Auxiliadora School (Salesianas), pharmacies, restaurants and cafes, etc.   Although it is possible to walk to many places of interest, the property is also very well connected by public transport as it has several bus stops in its vicinity (lines 31, 33, 34, 39... ), and only 15 minutes walk is the Zaragoza - Goya train station (C1 and medium distance trains). Also, the house has very easy access by road to the N-232, the N-330 and the Z-40. Do not lose this opportunity! Call us and we will arrange a visit without any commitment.

description: SPECTACULAR APARTMENT IN BOCA-CALLE OF AV. CESAR AUGUSTO (Calle Dr Val-Carreres 7) Welcome to the home of your dreams! Located on Calle Dr Val-Carreres Ortiz, this apartment of 165 useful meters is an authentic jewel of the city. If you are looking for a spacious and cozy place to call home, look no further! With a total of four bedrooms and two bathrooms, this home is perfect for large families or couples who want extra space to work from home. In addition, one of the rooms has its own bathroom, so you will have total privacy and comfort in your day to day. The rooms are spacious, which will allow you to have a variety of options to decorate and personalize your home. The house is located on a high floor, which offers several comforts such as greater privacy and tranquility as it is further away from the noise and activity of the street, enjoying panoramic views of the city and greater natural light throughout the day. The kitchen has a gallery that gives it a special touch and makes it brighter. Three terraces (2 of them exterior) will allow you to enjoy the sun and fresh air from the comfort of your own home. In addition, you can enjoy panoramic views of the city from your privileged position on the top floor. The central heating with individual meter will allow you to control the temperature of your home as you wish, while the ducted air conditioning will keep you cool on summer days. The entire apartment is exterior except for one room and the kitchen, which means that you will have plenty of natural light throughout the day. In addition, you will not have to worry about storage space thanks to the storage room included in the same building. A comprehensive reform of good quality has also been carried out and it has been recently updated, so everything is in perfect condition and ready to be enjoyed. This house is perfect for those looking for a prime location in the city, with easy access to everything you need. Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy luxury living in this one of a kind apartment. Come visit it! Offers will be heard.

Rooms are on the left of the house, and the living room, kitchen and dining room are on the right. Wide possibilities to reform and condition to the taste of each one. Heating and hot water is through an individual gas boiler. The house has a split air conditioning in the living room, and another in one of the rooms. The exterior carpentry is made of aluminum, except for the large windows in the living room with access to the balcony, which are made of wood in very good condition. And the interior carpentry is made of high quality wood. The floors are parquet, except for the kitchen and bathrooms, which are porcelain stoneware. The facade of the building has been recently renovated. Located next to the Church of Santiago Mayor, next to the Meliá hotel and in front of the Salamero square. Avenida César Augusto is one of the most representative streets in Zaragoza, accessing the central market, the Basilica del Pilar and the Puerta del Carmen. House of about 65 on the top floor, in a building from the 60s, well preserved in its facilities and common areas, with spacious and bright landings, and a lift at ground level. Recently renovated and redistributed, to make the best use of the space and provide it with functionality and a clean and careful aesthetic. Living room in two areas with large windows, kitchen with utility room and breakfast bar, two good-sized bedrooms and bathroom with shower and window. (See sketch) Wooden floor, lacquered doors, climalit exterior carpentry and armored door. For more information and visits, ALIERTA:.

description: Four exclusive semi-detached houses of new construction on the ground floor and first floor, with large garden and recreation areas, with careful design and an exquisite choice of materials and high quality. Each of the homes has a 450 m2 private plot with large gardens, an optional individual pool and a spacious porch area in the garden, as well as a covered area at the main entrance to park two vehicles. The design of each one of the houses allows different distributions and future extensions, such as adding a swimming pool or cellar optionally, according to the needs of the owners. On the ground floor, it has a large day area and is very bright thanks to its double orientation and its large windows, which together with the exterior porch allows you to enjoy around 60m2; Likewise, it includes a room, which can be used as a bedroom or as an office, as well as a full bathroom; which makes it possible, if desired, to make full life on the ground floor.On the first floor it has 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them in the master bedroom. Projected design with a functional construction and low future maintenance. The houses are located in Santa Fe, a residential neighborhood in a natural environment, ideal for those who demand tranquility, a few meters from the center of Cuarte de Huerva and a few minutes from Zaragoza.On consolidated urban land, with access to services such as schools, institutes, sports facilities, leisure and restaurants, urban bus lines, and very close to numerous green areas. Finishes and qualities: It includes a kitchen equipped with furniture and countertop, as well as a ceramic hob, electric oven, microwave, extractor hood and sink in stainless steel finish. Top-quality white vitrified porcelain sanitary ware and single-lever taps in the sink and shower. It is allowed to select bathroom ceramics, both floors and walls, within a careful selection of materials made by the project team.In addition, you can choose between three shades of smooth plastic paint for the walls. It has an A Energy Rating, which means significant energy and economic savings, so you can live and save at the same time in a comfortable and easy way.Continuous insulation on the outside of the façade (SATE system) is chosen, thus minimizing thermal bridges. Ventilation system with humidity-adjustable extractors on the roof and humidity-adjustable grilles in each room.What guarantees the quality of the air inside the house, controlling the levels of ventilation in a much more precise way and significantly increasing the tightness.

description: In the best area of Miralbueno and in one of the best developments in the neighborhood, today you have the unique opportunity to acquire this exclusive 4-bedroom duplex penthouse with almost 40 m2 of terraces. The penthouse is located on Enrique Val street, in the heart of the neighborhood, one of the fastest growing environments in Zaragoza. Its location could not be better: a few meters from one of the three Miralbueno schools, and very close to all the services and local businesses in the sector. The urbanization has large common areas, with a children's and adult pool, garden areas, children's areas and a football and basketball sports court. The penthouse, a fifth floor, has a total useful area of more than 200 m2, including some 32 m2 of terraces. Incredible true? Well wait, because you are going to love the distribution: the penthouse is completely exterior, with two orientations, the south orientation being the main one of the house. Entering, on the right hand side we find the 25 m2 living room, with access to a magnificent covered terrace of almost 18 m2, with more than enough space to place a table for six people and facing the midday sun. In front of the living room, the kitchen, of more than 9 m2, very spacious, and then its four bedrooms, all of them double, with surfaces between 14 and 11 m2, and two of the three bathrooms that the penthouse has, one of them inside the master bedroom. But this is not all.. . accessing from the living room, by a comfortable staircase, we go up to the upper floor, with sloping ceilings at a great height, where we find an open space of 65 m2 closed. It is currently conditioned as a large second dining room, with different environments: dining area, living area, reading area.. . It also has a bathroom, the third in the house. Finally, we can go out onto its open terrace, measuring 14 m2, with enough space for those celebrations that you love so much and that you will surely, surely.. . fall in love with. The penthouse is sold together with a parking space and a storage room, located in the same building. In addition, you will have the possibility of acquiring a second additional garage space, for €16,000. Do not let him get away. Penthouses like this are not seen every day….

description: FOR SALE SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE WITH FOUR FLOORS, WITH TWO BEAUTIFUL TERRACES AND A DOUBLE GARAGE PLACE LOCATED IN ALFAJARÍN, ONLY 17 KM FROM ZARAGOZA. Semi-detached house in Calle Valle de Ordesa, Alfajarín, municipality of the Central Region of the province of Zaragoza. Part of its municipal area is occupied by the Sotos y Galachos del Ebro Directed Nature Reserve. Town provided with all kinds of shops and services for the use and enjoyment of the inhabitants and the surrounding towns. The property consists of 181m2 built and 143m2 distributed over four floors as follows: - Street level or ground floor: Large 22m2 living room with fireplace, 25m2 terrace, kitchen and bathroom with shower and natural ventilation. - First floor: 3 double bedrooms, two of them equipped with a spacious double built-in wardrobe and the main one measuring 13m2, a complete bathroom with a shower tray and natural ventilation and a distributor. - Upper floor or attic: Large 25m2 room that can be used as a fourth bedroom and/or office, dressing room, etc. , with access to a 15m2 terrace. - Basement: Double garage space and 17m2 cellar (currently used as a storage room-warehouse). Housing equipped with very good qualities in perfect condition to move into: Parquet and marble floors, windows with climalit tilt-and-turn glass lacquered in white with thermal break, low emission control, solid oak interior doors, armored entrance door, updated electrical installation and plumbing. Individual gas heating and hot water, ducted air conditioning in all rooms of the house (hot and cold pump), except in the attic where there is a split inverter also with hot and cold pump. All exterior with very good orientation (cross, which produces ventilation in the property apart from being very bright and sunny), and beautiful views of the mountains. Do not miss this opportunity if you want to live away from the city, noise, traffic, pollution, etc. You will gain peace of mind and quality of life by being in continuous contact with nature, without giving up the advantages of big cities either, since it is located just a few kilometers from the Aragonese capital.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Alfajarin
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle Valle de Ordesa

description: We offer you this semi-detached house in María de Huerva. Construction of 2008 but brand new. The house has 4 floors: On the ground floor we have: a large living room of about 23 meters, a large kitchen of 10 meters and a toilet, where the boiler is located. The living room and the kitchen have access to a garden/terrace of about 40 meters. On the first floor we have 2 bedrooms, both suites. The first of 15 meters, with a 5-meter bathroom, the second, 10.50 meters, with a 4-meter bathroom. Both bedrooms have a built-in wardrobe. On the third floor we have the attic fully usable as a bedroom. We have almost 40 meters in total. It has a Velux-type window on the roof that allows a lot of light to enter. It also has a bathroom and access to a beautiful terrace with excellent views of nature. The house also has a good 35-meter cellar, where we have sockets to install a kitchen, fireplace or lower the heating radiators. There is also the possibility of closing an area to make a separate storage room. We also have a very large community garage space, where we can undoubtedly park two cars and a motorcycle. Individual gas heating, with thermostats separated by floors, to configure the heating more efficiently. Pre-installed air conditioning ducts. Nothing is charged to the buyer. Prices pending seller approval.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maria de Huerva
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Valle de Broto, 14

description: BIARRITZ-inmo: sunbathe, read a book in complete peace, take care of your plants, an aperitif with friends.. . you can enjoy all of this and much more on the terrace of this house that we offer you located on calle Zapata, between Avd. Madrid and Avd. from Navarre. It consists of a spacious living room, two bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, two balconies and a terrace. It has oak interior carpentry (with armored entrance), white aluminum exterior carpentry on the inside and wood on the façade, bathroom with window and shower tray, terrazzo floors, heating by low-consumption thermal emitters, water heated by an electric water heater, three built-in wardrobes (one very large in the living room, another that serves as a pantry in the kitchen and a small one in the bathroom) and a very sunny terrace due to its south orientation that has an awning, lighting and a water connection to be able to take care of your floors. Building built in 1975 with good conservation and an elevator was recently installed, leaving the patio without architectural barriers. The house is exterior (the entire façade of the building, located on the first floor of a total of four, with you being the only neighbor on the landing, is north facing and has good cross ventilation from the north of the façade to the sunny south of the terrace. It has a community cost of €70/month and 59 m2 useful approx. including the balconies, but not the terrace (you can ask us for more detailed plans). Do not hesitate and visit the house that I think will surprise you. CONTACT US, WE WILL BE HAPPY TO SHOW IT TO YOU!

description: Masquehogares sells a recently built corner townhouse in María de Huerva. The house consists of a large cellar of about 34 square meters, which we access from our two-car garage in the basement. Going up to the street floor we find a living room of just over 20 meters with access to a beautiful rear garden of about 40 meters, which we can also access from the 11-meter kitchen, with an elongated shape and space at the end of it. to set a table to eat. The floor is completed with a toilet of about 2.5 meters. On the first floor we find two large bedrooms, both very large, with three originally on this floor, but the previous owners decided that having an attic it was better to have two large bedrooms than three smaller ones, so we currently have a corner bedroom, With several windows and beautiful views, about 11.50 meters, and a main one with about 16.50 meters, where we can put a dressing room, a spacious bathroom of about 4 square meters completes the floor. On the second floor we find a large open-plan attic, just over 25 meters with a terrace that is also on the corner and again some beautiful views, Velux window on the roof and a large bathroom of more than 4 square meters, this floor can be used like a large master bedroom. Pre installation of air conditioning. individual gas heating The house is almost new, being built in 2008, with a brick façade and excellent quality materials. Final price subject to seller approval. Do not miss this opportunity and visit it. Without commission to the buyer, visit our website masquehogares. com.

description: From 220.000 € Flats with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with a garage and storage room included FIRST PHASE OF EXECUTION NOW ON SALE! We present LYRA RESIDENCIAL, a complex designed to enjoy family life, quiet and outdoors, in a young, dynamic area full of services. An exclusive residence of 64 spacious homes, with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with a garage and storage room included, and with more than 1.250 m2 of common areas that include a swimming pool, children's play area and barbecue area, in an extraordinary location, Cuarte de Huerva, just a few minutes from Zaragoza. Cuarte de Huerva makes countless services available to its neighbors: supermarkets, health center, educational centers, auditorium, civic center, sports center... and it also has a multitude of parks, green areas and large outdoor walks which will allow you to live in a healthy and natural environment, without giving up the comforts and services of the city. A unique project with a contemporary architectural design, based on elegance and uniqueness, without neglecting energy efficiency.SATE facades with great insulation and the combination of aerothermal energy and underfloor heating manage to provide great comfort to the home and considerably reduce energy consumption.Discover the rest of the qualities in our informative dossier. Each of the houses has spacious terraces, which give continuity to the living area of the house, generating a feeling of open space and spaciousness that is unique in Cuarte. We have impressive penthouses on one floor with large terraces and spectacular ground floor homes, with their huge gardens where you can enjoy open spaces and live unforgettable moments sharing with your loved ones.Feel the experience of living as in a single-family home, avoiding the inconvenience that stairs can cause. Kitchens are the heart of the house, which is why in Lyra Residencial the kitchens are designed to be integrated into the living area as an option.The main bedrooms have been designed as a suite, all of them with a dressing room and their own bathroom. Possibility of a second optional garage space. common facilities • Picnic area equipped with barbecue and bathrooms to share unforgettable leisure moments with family or friends. • Children's playground for the fun and entertainment of the little ones. • Swimming pool with large green areas to enjoy the sun and the water on hot summer days. If what you are looking for are moments of relaxation and enjoyment with family and friends, Lyra Residencial is your best option.

description: Are you looking for a single-family home very close to Zaragoza? Masquehogares offers you this magnificent townhouse of very good construction in Villamayor de Gallego. Villamayor is a municipality located just 10km from Zaragoza, with a very good road connection. It has many municipal services such as a Health Center, swimming pools, sports hall, gym, public school, pharmacy, bars, supermarket and small shops. It also has a bus line (bus 210), with frequencies every 30 min, and the possibility of using the Lazo Card. It is a house that has a good size per floor, with very good qualities. We access through the front garden, which has been tiled for the most part to provide it with more comfort on a day-to-day basis. This area is about 25 meters. It has an awning. From this terrace we have two entrances to the house, one to a spacious hall of about 6 meters and the other directly to the magnificent and bright living room of almost 50 meters. On the street level we have the kitchen of about 13 meters, renovated in 2020 and hardly used. A toilet completes the floor. Originally this street floor had a bedroom, which was divided between the living room and the hall. The first floor is distributed as follows: * Master bedroom suite of almost 20 meters, with dressing room in "L" and bathroom. * Secondary bedroom of about 12 meters, with built-in wardrobe. * Third bedroom, about 10 meters, with access to a large terrace of almost 18 meters. All bedrooms face East, with morning sun. The basement floor: * We have a wonderful cellar, fully installed and with a kitchen (27 meters) * Storage room (3.50 meters) * Garage space, open to the community garage for a large car and motorcycle. The house has individual gas heating. We also have air conditioning on the floor of the rooms. Community fees are very low, only 63 euros/month. Do you want to see the house? Call now and arrange a visit. If you have to sell to buy, call us and we will find the best solution for you.

Although the house is in need of updating, it is a good option both to invest and put it into profitability (in the Almozara there is a high demand for rentals), and to use it as a first habitual residence. The reconsideration of spaces carried out by the former owners stands out in order to optimize the m² of the house to the maximum. Light, thanks to its east-west orientation, is not lacking in the house throughout the day. La Almozara is one of the most popular neighborhoods in all of Zaragoza and with the highest demand for housing. A lively neighborhood, full of local shops and supermarkets; health center, leisure areas such as Boulevard de Pablo Gargallo, next to the Aljafería palace; green areas with spaces for the little ones, for sports lovers, with several routes to go for a walk, one of the most beautiful in the city, and for the whole family in general. From the Ebro park we are in Gran Casa in 10 minutes walking through the pedestrian walkway that connects the two banks. The expo, the water park, are areas that we can enjoy almost daily living in this area.
