description: In the best area of Valdespartera, on La Diligencia street, a few meters from the tram and in an environment with all the services, we present this beautiful three-bedroom house with wonderful terraces. Built in 2010, it is located in an urbanization with common areas that include a swimming pool, garden areas and sports areas. The house is officially protected, so buyers must meet the relevant requirements. Ask us and we will explain. It has a total useful area of about 116 m2, 86 m2 of which are closed, plus about 30 m2 of terraces. It has a perfect distribution. We access through a large distributor. Entering on the right we find the kitchen, of more than 10 m2, fully furnished and equipped, and with space to eat perfectly for the whole family. From the kitchen we go out to its spectacular terrace, about 24 m2, with artificial grass, an ideal space for the enjoyment of children, or to spend a wonderful afternoon in the company of your loved ones. How you wanted to have a space like this! Advancing down the corridor we find the three bedrooms, all of them double, measuring more than 10 m2, and the two bathrooms, one with a shower and the main one with a bathtub and double sink. Finally, entering on the left we have the dining room, almost 24 m2. From the living room, we go out to another terrace, greenhouse type. The house is in perfect condition and has very good finishes: wooden floors throughout the house, oak doors, central heating with individual meter, aluminum exterior carpentry.. . In addition, it is sold together with TWO GARAGE SPACES and a storage room, located in the building itself. All this included in the price. Did you like what we have told you? description: Living in a 2-bedroom apartment on the ground floor with a terrace in Valdespartera, Zaragoza, can have several advantages, such as the following: Easy Access: One of the biggest advantages of living in a ground floor apartment is easy access. You will not have to climb stairs or use the elevator, which can be beneficial if you have mobility problems or if you like to have direct access to the street. Terrace: The outdoor terrace can be a significant advantage, since it will allow you to enjoy the outdoors or sunbathe without having to leave the house. In addition, the terraces can be an ideal space for leisure and entertainment. Natural light: Living on the ground floor, you will likely have a greater amount of natural light than on other higher floors. This can be beneficial for health, mood and savings on energy bills. Extra space: If the terrace is big enough, you could use it as extra space to store bicycles, garden tools or even to create an urban garden. Location: Valdespartera is a residential neighborhood in Zaragoza, surrounded by green areas and close to the city center. By living in this neighborhood, you could enjoy a quiet and pleasant life, with access to services such as supermarkets, schools and public transport. In short, living in a ground floor apartment with a terrace in Valdespartera could be an excellent option for those looking for a comfortable, bright space in the open air, close to the city center but surrounded by green areas. VPO housing, still subject to restrictions on live transmissions, if you do not know the requirements, call and we will detail them. Book your appointment now, limited visits!

description: EXCLUSIVE PENTHOUSE-DUPLEX IN THE FULL OF PASEO DAMAS, WITH GARAGE, THE HIGHEST! Duplex penthouse on Paseo de las Damas next to Corte Inglés. It is the highest in the entire center. It stands out for its luminosity and terrace for exclusive use, with spectacular views of almost 360 degrees over Zaragoza, including the Basilica del Pilar. And with absolute privacy. The distribution is as follows: First floor: we enter a small hall with access to the 28 m2 living room, with a fireplace and access to a covered balcony overlooking the Paseo de las Damas. In the same hall, there are the access stairs to the upper floor and a large closet, which could well be a storage room due to its size. Through a corridor there is access to a large 13 m2 bedroom with built-in wardrobes. Next to it is the 9 m2 kitchen, with a small balcony with views and a complete bathroom of almost 4 m2 with a bathtub. All rooms are exterior to Paseo Damas. Upper floor: from the stairs we access the treasure of the house, a large terrace of about 60 m2 that has a water tap for the installation of an outdoor shower, the filling of a small pool or the care of plants. The amplitude is enough to install a pergola with hammocks, loungers, table, chairs.. . etc. Next to the terrace is a small laundry room. The plant has two bedrooms of 11 and 13 m2 with a built-in wardrobe each. It also has a complete bathroom of almost 4 m2 with a shower tray. An access door to the master bedroom and bathroom allows the bedroom to be converted into a suite (see plan), with a window to the terrace that ensures rest and privacy. The qualities are: beech doors, parquet flooring, carpentry on the ground floor in wood and on the upper floor in white lacquered PVC. Both heating and hot water are central. The house has split air conditioning in the living room and in the three bedrooms. PARKING SPACE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE. It is located on the same block as the house (Residencial Paraíso Parking). It is a space for a large car. In case you are not interested in the garage space, it can be sold without it. ELEVATOR TO LEVEL ZERO. In short, it is a PENTHOUSE in the heart of Zaragoza with a very large terrace and unbeatable VIEWS and PRIVACY. Highlight the number of services around the property: supermarkets, schools, institutes, parks, buses, tram, restaurant area, etc. DO NOT LET IT ESCAPE, YOU WILL LIKE IT!

description: Residencial Camellia Garden, the most exclusive promotion of Grupo Lobe. The exclusive Residencial Camellia Garden is made up of 96 extraordinary homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms plus spacious living rooms with large windows that will give natural light to the room and spectacular duplex penthouses with a double-height living room. It is projected to the south of Zaragoza, with the best communications to both the Ctra. Madrid and Avd. Gomez Laguna. Its proximity to the Canal Park, numerous Health Centers, sports and educational facilities, places this residential in an ideal place to live. The terraces of the houses will be very spacious, designed to become a perfect corner in which to disconnect and relax at any time of the year. The kitchens will be equipped with all electrical appliances, some will even have a work island providing greater storage capacity and ease of use. The built-in wardrobes in the homes will have interior cladding, and almost all homes include a spacious separate walk-in closet in the master bedroom. The qualities of the bathrooms are exceptional, with highly resistant and antibacterial paneling and shower trays, combined with modern design vinyl paper that will set a trend in the current concept of new housing. The residential will have a pleasant common area with walking areas where you can enjoy a swimming pool and a children's play area. The houses include a garage and storage room. description: ALFONSO I BUILDING - EIGHT LUXURY HOUSES IN THE CORAZON DE ZARAGOZA This project rehabilitates a building located on Alfonso 34 street, in the heart of Zaragoza, just 100 meters from the Plaza del Pilar. As a result: 8 homes: 6 floors of 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms on the second and third floors and 2 attic duplexes on the fourth floor and under cover, overlooking Alfonso Street. The project of integral rehabilitation of the building contemplates the rehabilitation of the facade, the change of cover, installations, partitions, carpentry, installation of elevator etc… incorporating modern materials and respecting the charm of the buildings of the time. For exterior carpentry, finishes are commensurate with the original aesthetics of the building but with more suitable materials for greater energy use. In the interior finishes, more contemporary finishes and materials have been sought that integrate while retaining the charm of the building. Redistribute spaces looking for light and spaciousness. In the 1-bedroom apartments the space is unified, the kitchens adapt to new uses and are integrated as part of the living space thus achieving the feeling of spaciousness and luminosity in all spaces of the house. The terminations are adaptable to the tastes and needs of the client.

description: QUIET LIFE 20 MINUTES FROM THE CENTER OF ZARAGOZA, LA PUEBLA DE ALFINDÉN. FANTASTIC DUPLEX PENTHOUSE OF THE YEAR 2009, DISTRIBUTED IN LIVING ROOM, KITCHEN, TWO BEDROOMS, BATHROOM, TOILET AND TERRACE OF 6 METERS. GARAGE AND STOREROOM. Semi-new construction duplex penthouse for sale in the center of La Puebla de Alfindén, on Fernando Moliné street, built in 2009 in perfect condition. Distributed on the ground floor, a large living room of about 22 meters, kitchen and toilet, on the upper floor two bedrooms, one single with a slight sloping ceiling, a full bathroom with a bathtub, the master bedroom has access to a terrace of approximately 6 meters with excellent views. The access staircase to this upper floor is very comfortable and wide. Very sunny and bright, southwest facing, with individual gas heating, climalit windows, wooden floors, oak doors and a separate kitchen from the living room. Building with a large elevator, without architectural barriers. It includes an easy-to-maneuver garage for a large car and a storage room of about 4 square meters, both in the first basement of the same building, with direct access from the elevator. Population fourteen kilometers from Zaragoza, next to the Malpica and Alfindén industrial estates, perfectly communicated. Equipped with all services, health center, schools, green areas, pharmacy and local shops. Manages Fincas San Carlos, telephones  Translated by Google Translator.

description: EXCLUSIVE PENTHOUSE-DUPLEX IN THE FULL OF PASEO DAMAS, WITH GARAGE, THE HIGHEST! Duplex penthouse on Paseo de las Damas next to Corte Inglés. It is the highest in the entire center. It stands out for its luminosity and terrace for exclusive use, with spectacular views of almost 360 degrees over Zaragoza, including the Basilica del Pilar. And with absolute privacy. The distribution is as follows: First floor: we enter a small hall with access to the 28 m2 living room, with a fireplace and access to a covered balcony overlooking the Paseo de las Damas. In the same hall, there are the access stairs to the upper floor and a large closet, which could well be a storage room due to its size. Through a corridor there is access to a large 13 m2 bedroom with built-in wardrobes. Next to it is the 9 m2 kitchen, with a small balcony with views and a complete bathroom of almost 4 m2 with a bathtub. All rooms are exterior to Paseo Damas. Upper floor: from the stairs we access the treasure of the house, a large terrace of about 60 m2 that has a water tap for the installation of an outdoor shower, the filling of a small pool or the care of plants. The amplitude is enough to install a pergola with hammocks, loungers, table, chairs.. . etc. Next to the terrace is a small laundry room. The plant has two bedrooms of 11 and 13 m2 with a built-in wardrobe each. It also has a complete bathroom of almost 4 m2 with a shower tray. An access door to the master bedroom and bathroom allows the bedroom to be converted into a suite (see plan), with a window to the terrace that ensures rest and privacy. The qualities are: beech doors, parquet flooring, carpentry on the ground floor in wood and on the upper floor in white lacquered PVC. Both heating and hot water are central. The house has split air conditioning in the living room and in the three bedrooms. PARKING SPACE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE. It is located on the same block as the house (Residencial Paraíso Parking). It is a space for a large car. In case you are not interested in the garage space, it can be sold without it. ELEVATOR TO LEVEL ZERO. In short, it is a PENTHOUSE in the heart of Zaragoza with a very large terrace and unbeatable VIEWS and PRIVACY. Highlight the number of services around the property: supermarkets, schools, institutes, parks, buses, tram, restaurant area, etc. DO NOT LET IT ESCAPE, YOU WILL LIKE IT!

suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Paseo de las Damas, 32

description: Are you looking for a comfortable apartment, with a garage and storage room in Cuarte de Huerva? You just found it: take a look at the 3D tour and fall in love with this apartment built in 2007 with elevator, garage and storage room in Cuarte de Huerva. This useful 56 m² apartment in Ramón y Cajal is ready to become your home. The building is in very good condition, brand new!, with an elevator (a detail that you will surely appreciate when moving and when you return from the supermarket), it has community parking and an intercom. The garage has a direct entrance to the block and the storage room is right there, in the square itself, all amenities. The house is distributed in 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living room and kitchen. It has fitted wardrobes, balcony, bathtub and electrical appliances. When you enter through the main security door, the first thing you find is the 20.13 m² living room, with a very large window through which spectacular light enters and exit to a balcony. Do you like plants? Here they will grow wonderfully! Thanks to its northeast orientation. If you liked the living room, wait until you see the kitchen. In the kitchen, with its 6.58 m², there is plenty of space to place a small table where you can have breakfast, lunch and dinner comfortably. It is fully equipped and the space is used very well, look how many closets! You will not lack space to store everything you need. The bathroom is a 4.83 m² cucada, fully equipped and with a very spacious and comfortable bathtub, perfect for two. Have you seen the main bedroom of (nothing more and nothing less) than 12.90 m².You will love waking up in this room thanks to its large window, which gives off spectacular light. Last but not least impressive is the 7.70 m² second bedroom, which has plenty of space to make it a gym, study or the dressing room you've always wanted. The qualities of this brand new apartment (adjective) are not far behind: -The walls are smooth. -The doors are made of wood, beautiful and modern. Have you noticed the ground? It is beautiful, current laminate and also very clean. -The aluminum windows, double glazing will make you forget the cold days of Zaragoza. -The heating is individual natural gas and radiators in all rooms: always warm! The area is quiet and has all the services one step away: all. And what community expenses does this stomp have? Well, only €70.00 yes, you read correctly. After this, are you going to stay without visiting this opportunity? Call us and schedule a visit without obligation right now, we know that it will not last long! At Doctor Property we help you at every step of the purchase: -Do you need financing? We find the mortgage with the best conditions for you.This way you save time going from bank to bank. -Save yourself endless calls to change supplies to your new home.We take care of changes of ownership and, if you want, to find the best offers for you to save on your bills. -We take care of all contracts and procedures and accompany you to the notarial signature.Then all that remains is to celebrate! In addition, you will know the amount of our services from the first moment so that there are no surprises.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cuarte de Huerva
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Ramon y Cajal, 2

description: RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE, is a unique residential complex made up of 65 exclusive homes, within a gated community with private access control. WHAT ARE THEIR CHARACTERISTICS? The urbanization has more than 3.000 m2 of green areas with lots of trees and gardening, a children's area and a swimming pool for adults and children. The residential complex will also have a coworking room-gastroteca and gym, with access to a picnic area with a pergola. The 3 and 4 bedroom homes, large living rooms and spacious terraces where you can enjoy the tranquility and comfort of your new home with your family, are characterized by their excellent double orientation and magnificent views of the natural environment that surrounds the residential area. The ground floors with a garden and the penthouses with a private solarium are undoubtedly the most outstanding homes in the residential area. WHY CHOOSE MONTEVERDE? The reasons for choosing Monteverde apart from the characteristics of the homes themselves are: Energy efficiency, sustainability, the highest qualities in thermal and acoustic insulation are some of the characteristics of LUJAMA homes. All of this allows us to achieve the highest energy rating A, all backed by a modern architectural design by one of the most prestigious architectural firms in Zaragoza, Clua-Longas Arquitectos. One of the highlights of RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE is its excellent location. Its fast accessibility, with direct connections to the center of Zaragoza and the Z-40 make this modern residential the best located in the town. The environment is equipped with commercial areas, with multiple supermarkets, sports facilities, cultural centers, schools, as well as the variety and breadth of green areas where you can walk and play sports, make RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE the ideal place for a family like yours.

description: In the best area of Valdespartera, on La Diligencia street, a few meters from the tram and in an environment with all the services, we present this beautiful three-bedroom house with wonderful terraces. Built in 2010, it is located in an urbanization with common areas that include a swimming pool, garden areas and sports areas. The house is officially protected, so buyers must meet the relevant requirements. Ask us and we will explain. It has a total useful area of about 116 m2, 86 m2 of which are closed, plus about 30 m2 of terraces. It has a perfect distribution. We access through a large distributor. Entering on the right we find the kitchen, of more than 10 m2, fully furnished and equipped, and with space to eat perfectly for the whole family. From the kitchen we go out to its spectacular terrace, about 24 m2, with artificial grass, an ideal space for the enjoyment of children, or to spend a wonderful afternoon in the company of your loved ones. How you wanted to have a space like this! Advancing down the corridor we find the three bedrooms, all of them double, measuring more than 10 m2, and the two bathrooms, one with a shower and the main one with a bathtub and double sink. Finally, entering on the left we have the dining room, almost 24 m2. From the living room, we go out to another terrace, greenhouse type. The house is in perfect condition and has very good finishes: wooden floors throughout the house, oak doors, central heating with individual meter, aluminum exterior carpentry.. . In addition, it is sold together with TWO GARAGE SPACES and a storage room, located in the building itself. All this included in the price. Did you like what we have told you? Well, wait until you see your new home, because you are going to love it!

description: Living in a 4-bedroom apartment on the ground floor with a terrace of approximately 20 meters in Valdespartera, Zaragoza, can have several advantages, such as the following: Easy Access: One of the biggest advantages of living in a ground floor apartment is easy access. Terrace: The 20-meter terrace can be a significant advantage, since it will allow you to enjoy the outdoors or sunbathe without having to leave the house. In addition, the terraces can be an ideal space for leisure and entertainment. Natural light: Living on the ground floor, you will likely have a greater amount of natural light than on other higher floors. This can be beneficial for health, mood and savings on energy bills. Extra space: If the terrace is big enough, you could use it as extra space to store bicycles, garden tools or even to create an urban garden. Location: Valdespartera is a residential neighborhood in Zaragoza, surrounded by green areas and close to the city center. By living in this neighborhood, you could enjoy a quiet and pleasant life, with access to services such as supermarkets, schools and public transport. In short, living in a ground floor apartment with a terrace in Valdespartera could be an excellent option for those looking for a comfortable, bright space in the open air, close to the city center but surrounded by green areas. description: SPACIOUS APARTMENT WITH OUTDOOR TERRACE IN PASEO SAGASTA This magnificent apartment is the perfect place for those looking for a spacious and comfortable home in one of the most exclusive areas of the city. With 119 useful m2, this apartment has three large bedrooms, another office type and three bathrooms, which makes it an ideal option for large families or for those looking for additional work space at home. The apartment is located on the fifth floor of the building, which gives it an impressive view of the city and an abundant amount of natural light in all the rooms. In addition, being oriented to the east and west, an optimal temperature is guaranteed throughout the year. The apartment has enormous potential to become a dream home. Community heating guarantees an optimal temperature in all seasons of the year, and the built-in wardrobes offer ample storage space. However, the highlight of this apartment is its magnificent outdoor terrace, which offers an ideal relaxing space to enjoy the panoramic views of the city and enjoy the sun. The terrace is perfect for al fresco dining with friends and family, or just relaxing after a tiring day. The property also has an unbeatable location in the heart of Paseo Sagasta, one of the most prestigious and exclusive streets in Zaragoza. This street is home to the best restaurants, shops, and services the city has to offer, ensuring a comfortable and convenient living experience for its residents. In short, this apartment is the perfect option for those looking for a spacious, comfortable and well-located home in the heart of the city. description: We present "MARÍA AGUSTÍN 40", quality homes located in Paseo María Agustín nº 40-56, one of the historical places of Zaragoza. description: No added commissions to the buyer client.COME VISIT IT.Magnificent independent Villa, perfect condition to move into, very bright and sunny.The entire house is surrounded by a wonderful garden, with all kinds of fruit trees and ornamental plants, olive trees, palm trees, an outdoor barbecue, an orchard area, automatic irrigation, a beautiful 30 m2 porch on the ground floor with views of the entire garden.House of 466 m2 built, on a plot of 1662 m2. Access to the property, by pedestrian gate and motorized vehicle gate.Closed garage with automatic door.Very comfortable interior layout, with a beautiful and wide staircase and with natural light throughout the staircase.Semi-basement floor, street floor and first floor.Exterior carpentry throughout the wooden house, with double glazing, wooden doors, air conditioning in the living room and master bedroom.Individual gas heating.The entire house exterior to the entire garden, with large windows and windows in all rooms including bathroom and cellar. The ground floor is distributed in a 55 m2 living room, a 30 m2 kitchen with direct access to the porch, 2 14 m2 double rooms each, 1 6 m2 full bathroom and a 30 m2 master bedroom with a 9 m2 en-suite bathroom.All rooms have fitted wardrobes. On the first floor, a large and spacious hall with access to a beautiful terrace with views of the entire garden and landscape, 2 impressive rooms of 40 m2 each, which can be converted into 4 rooms, with only one partition in each, since doors and windows are distributed for this, you can also make one or 2 bathrooms on this floor. On the semi-basement floor, we have a beautiful 90 m2 cellar, fully installed and furnished, fireplace, bottle racks, pantry, kitchen.1 full bathroom and on this floor direct access to the garage, open plan of about 90 m2, capacity for several cars, gym, workshop area, many possibilities. Location in Residencial El Zorongo, just 10 minutes from the city center, one of the best residential areas in terms of quality of life, surrounded by tranquility and with maximum security, security surveillance with a booth at the entrance and an access barrier, 24 hoursAll kinds of sports facilities, swimming pools of various sizes, garden areas, several tennis courts, paddle tennis courts, 2 frontons, multi-sport courts, soccer field, barbecues with picnic area, children's playground, restaurant and bar with year-round service, gym with machines and various activity rooms, postal service, doctor's office, chapel, urban bus service, even with "owl" night hours on weekends. We are waiting for you to show it to you personally.

description: At AS DE PISOS we have for sale this beautiful rustic land with a two-storey INDEPENDENT CHALET, garage, storage rooms, gardens and recreational areas, all with QUALITY CONSTRUCTION, very well maintained and tastefully designed. Located in the municipality of María de Huerva, between the towns of Jaulín and Botorrita, twenty-five minutes from Zaragoza by highway. In the MONTEPINAR urbanization, it is a fun and welcoming association of about 150 families with homes of the same type since the 80s. This 2400m² plot is completely enclosed by a fence and wall and is completely self-sufficient and ecological, since electricity is supplied with a photovoltaic installation of nine solar panels and their storage batteries, home heating is obtained by a high-quality boiler that It works with coal and firewood and provides heat to all the radiators distributed throughout the house, as well as obtaining an excellent temperature with the fireplaces in the home. The accumulation of water is obtained from a 20,000-liter cistern and eighteen thousand and two thousand-liter tanks distributed for the plot. The house with a wonderful distribution (SEE PLANS) is divided into two heights. On the ground floor we have the living area with the entrance from the porch to a large kitchen and a cozy living room with a fireplace and on the upper floor there is the rest area with a hall, four double bedrooms and a bathroom. Outside we can enjoy two entrances, the main one is pedestrian and we have another wide entrance for vehicles, several gardens, large areas with beautiful stone floors for solariums, recreation areas, gazebos, etc. where we can also find the barbecue area and the entrance to the garage and warehouses. If you do not know MONTEPINAR, apart from the beautiful setting and life in nature, we recommend that you see photographs, the good neighborliness of the area, etc. on the web and social networks such as: w. aragonesasi. com/zaragoza/mariadehuerva/montepinar. php w. Facebook. com/montepinarzaragoza/? locale=es_ESw. w. is. top10place. com/association-friends-montepinar-45115858. html Do not hesitate to come and see this wonderful plot, call the phone now, we will be happy to accompany you on your visit.

description: Thirteen exclusive penthouses are available in the Torres de Villahermosa development, at the confluence of Vía Univérsitas and Duquesa Villahermosa, in front of the Esquinas theater and Parque Delicias and five minutes from the Hospital Clínic and Aragonia.All of them have three bedrooms except one with four. They have a very differential modern design that is difficult to find, a spectacular double-height room of more than thirty meters with large windows, which gives it great visual amplitude and wonderful light and with access to a large side terrace of more than fifteen meters.Duplex type plus the upper terrace The views are impressive as there is no height competition with the nearby buildings.They will leave you speechless.Choose according to the orientation and panorama you prefer.Northwest facing Moncayo and Delicias Park, south to the private garden of the community with a view to Ciudad Jardín and a large part of the city or facing east with El Pilar and the pre-Pyrenees in the background.You can enjoy the views from the impressive solarium terraces of more than forty meters, with exclusive access and enjoyment.Let yourself go and visualize yourself enjoying them with your friends and family….Suitable for installing a barbecue, chilling area with a small pool or jacuzzi or growing a small garden or orchard. It has modern finishes with white lacquered interior carpentry (doors and fitted wardrobes), elegant dark flooring, large windows or floor-to-ceiling doors.The kitchens are assembled by our Zaragoza-based partners at Ártico furniture, making the most of the spaces with tall cabinets throughout the countertop bench and of course with all the appliances (refrigerator, paneled washing machine and dishwasher). Other information of interest: pre-installation and Carrier machine for central air conditioning, heating and hot water with individualized consumption, on the 16th floor except for two of them on the 12th floor, physical concierge in the mornings plus daily cleaning in the afternoon, video surveillance in portals and garages. We are located in the enclave of the old Cavalry Barracks from which this project recovers part of its remains, making the building a direct member of our historical heritage. The project consists of a total of 114 homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, with large terraces to enjoy the outdoors, the exterior views and where you will not lack sunlight due to any of the orientations that our new building offers you. Panoramic penthouses on the ground floor and duplex penthouses have also been designed where the spaciousness of their terraces or their solariums give added value to your home. The project is equipped with the latest technology in terms of heating and ventilation systems, by means of aerothermal machines and independent heat recuperators for each home; thus achieving maximum energy efficiency. The innovative façade with avant-garde design is striking, which also pays special attention to thermal and acoustic insulation. Another of the building's jewels is the top floor, where we have created a landscaped roof that includes an infinity pool, a gym and a large common-use solarium from where you can disconnect from daily obligations, without giving up the comfort of your home. We will also have a large commercial space, and large parking spaces and storage rooms. Parking spaces and storage rooms are not included in the prices, as there are different dimensions. Parking spaces from 22. € 400 + VAT and storage rooms from 4. € 600 + VAT.

description: Do you dream of living in a completely independent villa, with enough space for the whole family and only 15 minutes from the center of Zaragoza? Then you have to see this property... This magnificent villa is built on a 3,000-meter urban plot, fully fenced and with everything you need to have an unbeatable quality of life. The heating is individual diesel and also has a hot and cold pump, as well as water and discharge from Zaragoza. The house has several buildings, to perfectly manage the use of its 1000m built. The main house consists of 2 floors of 200 m each and a basement / cellar of 40m. The ground floor is divided into three areas; A spacious hall with a toilet for visitors, where the majestic wooden staircase that will give us access to the first floor is located. To the left of the hall, there is a living room, an ironing and laundry room, a single bedroom with a full bathroom, which can be used as a service room, and a beautiful kitchen-diner that gives access to an underground cellar, perfect for the most oenophiles The right part of the hall leads to the living-dining room area, distributed in 4 different spaces, where you can read, have an aperitif by the fireplace, have lunch or dinner with our guests and even an office for personal use. The main staircase leads us to the upper floor, where there are 3 double bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, as well as a suite-type double bedroom, with two very large independent dressing rooms and a full double bathroom with a round hydromassage bathtub and shower. The doors of the rooms and the built-in wardrobes are made of oak from a 12th century church. The garden has a fenced tennis court, of regulatory measures for the enjoyment of the most sporty and a newly renovated pool with a large recreation area around it, where you can organize beautiful parties in summer. In addition, it has several independent constructions for different uses; A 70 m closed gazebo in front of the pool, with large folding windows to be able to use it throughout the year.It has an independent kitchen with barbecue and a bright living-dining room with fireplace, sofa area and wooden dining table...all decorated in a rustic Aragonese style, which makes this room one of the most welcoming and comfortable areas of the entire house. The other building is a 50m guest house, with a double room and bathroom en suite, totally independent from the main one. The 100m garage has capacity for 4 cars and is closed with doors to protect them or in case you want to give it any other use. Do you like dogs?.There is also a space for them, with booths and a closed area in the garden, in case you do not want them to disturb the guests. The farm has all kinds of vegetation that create numerous shaded areas, making it a perfect place to be in contact with nature without leaving your own home...something that is priceless when we have experienced a confinement. It is located in front of the La Venta del Olivar neighborhood and very close to several well-known restaurants in the area. It has a city bus at the door to go to Zaragoza. If you have school-age children, there are 2 well-known schools right in front of the house or you have bus stops at the door for any other center. If you are one of those who prefer to lead a quieter and more independent life, without the rules of a community of neighbors, but with all the advantages of living next to the city center...this is your house! Do not hesitate to call us if you want to make a visit or clarify any questions you may have if you need financing. We are here to help you get the house of your dreams!

On the second floor there are another 5 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and 2 terraces, one solarium with incredible views of the entire estate and another glazed in the master bedroom. description: Beautiful VPA 1-bedroom apartments for sale, located in a recently built building on Vía Hispanidad. It has very good communications, being only 3 minutes from the nearest tram stop. It is 5 minutes from Hospital Miguel Servet, Parque Grande, Aragona and with immediate access to the city rounds. At the same time, it is a quiet residential area that has a variety of services and shops in the Casablanca neighborhood. The accesses between housing-garage-storage room and exterior are comfortable and fully accessible, with elevators and access ramps. It has hot water and centralized heating with individualized control per floor that provides great comfort benefits. In addition, the house has a large terrace and windows that provide great light. VERY IMPORTANT: As it is a VPA home, in order to qualify for its purchase, the buyer must not own another apartment and their annual income (add the amounts in boxes 435 and 460 of the 2021 rent) must be between a minimum of 12,159 € and a maximum of €40,531 (if the buyers are 2 people, the maximum amount of income would be €52,111). Direct deal with the property, total transparency. Below you can see our virtual tour.

description: Are you looking for a home where you can spend weekends or vacation periods, surrounded by nature and with enough space to give it all the uses you want? If you like to ride a bike, take walks in the countryside, play with your dogs outdoors, have your own garden, a small farm or even your own horses and have everything just one step away from Zaragoza... this is the perfect place to do it! The house is built on a 2,000m fenced plot, within a 15,000m agricultural estate. It is located on the Pinseque road, between Garrapinillos and Casetas, 5 minutes from either of these two rural neighborhoods and only 20 minutes from Zaragoza. The house has a total of 400 meters, divided into 2 buildings. A main house of 200 m, distributed as follows; 3 double bedrooms, 1 single, 1 full bathroom, separate kitchen with pantry and a very large living room with fireplace. The outdoor area has a garage for 4 cars, a green area with a pool and barbecue. There are also several buildings of about 200m in total, which can be used for different uses (more bedrooms, warehouse, cellar, stables, chicken coops... ) in short, you can give it as many uses as you want. The house has electricity, well water and individual oil heating. There is the possibility of acquiring more land that belongs to the farm and thus have a total of 25,000m If you are one of those who like to INVEST, do not miss this opportunity either, since due to the dimensions of both the farm, the house and the rest of the buildings, it could be used as a RURAL HOUSE or even a RESIDENCE, both options in high demand. in the area and highly profitable. Whatever the option that best suits you, do not stay with the desire to see it and tell us any questions you may have. We will be delighted to help you!

description: Do you want to live in the new fashionable residential area in Zaragoza? We have your ideal house. In a small, familiar and private urbanization, upon entering you discover an authentic oasis: palm trees, plants, natural grass and in the center a wonderful pool, which due to its orientation, has sun both morning and afternoon. Shall we enter the house of your dreams? It is a townhouse with a small garden where you can have your chillout area, for hot nights. Above the garden and with access from the small hall and from the living room, there is a terrace, perfect both for having breakfast and for watching your children enjoy the pool. Upon entering, we are struck by the luminosity and spaciousness of the living room, with large windows overlooking the aforementioned terrace. Next to the living room, there is a large toilet, with a storage area for pool towels. and at the end a large kitchen, with large windows, equipped and even with the possibility of placing a family table. In one corner of the room are the stairs, made of wood, both to go up to the upper floors and to go down to the cellar. We climb? On the 1st floor, there are 4 very bright double bedrooms, one of them with a built-in wardrobe, and a spacious fully equipped bathroom with a bathtub. On the 2nd floor, there is the jewel of this house, a special place for the couple, a living room, with access to a large intimate terrace and an en-suite room, with large built-in wardrobes and a very large fully renovated bathroom. The cellar is presided over by a fireplace, where you can enjoy those family meals or dinners with friends. From the cellar, we can go out to our large garage, with capacity for two cars or a storage area; and even with the possibility of closing it, as several neighbors have already done. The house of your dreams is waiting for you, come and meet it! We also help you with financing. Remax Finca Hogar is always by your side, both to get the house of your dreams and to advise you throughout the purchase process.

All rooms very BRIGHT. Built-in closet in the hallway. Central heating and water, included in the community fee. Two elevators, GARAGE AND STORAGE ROOM that is accessed from the elevator. A LUXURY TO LIVE IN THIS BEAUTIFUL HOUSE! In the center, but quiet. YOU WILL NOT HAVE SEEN ANY LIKE IT, YOU WILL BE SURPRISED! You have found the HOUSE OF YOUR DREAMS. Call us to visit it! You'll love it.

description: Exclusive villa in the heart of Zaragoza, on the emblematic promenade of the city "Ruiseñores", a few meters from Paseo de Sagasta and a few minutes walk from the lung of Zaragoza "Parque Grande José Antonio Labordeta", surrounded by the necessary services for the day to day, public transport, schools, institute, health center, supermarkets... This wonderful house is made up of 4 floors but this is not a problem since it has an elevator with a stop on each of its floors. We access the house through a terrace - garden that through some stairs will take us to a cozy area with a covered porch and access door to the house.Directly we find a large, very cozy living room with large windows, a complete bathroom with a shower and a modern kitchen equipped with all electrical appliances.Mention a useful, spacious wardrobe in the distributor area. On the ground floor, a cellar area that is set up as an office with a window which allows natural light and a completely independent garage. On the first floor, with a very good layout, we find the master suite-type bedroom of more than 14 square meters with a spacious 7.15-square-meter bathroom with a bathtub, sink with double sink, a wonderful and useful 6-square-meter dressing room, and a cozy terrace of more than five meters. Another complete bathroom in this case with a shower in the distribution area that serves the other two double rooms, these are approximately 11 square meters, with spacious built-in wardrobes. Finally, a beautiful attic furnished as a youth bedroom with its privacy and with access to a covered clothes rack space and to the beautiful and cozy solarium-type terrace of more than 31 square meters paved with Ipe wood slats, where you can enjoy unforgettable moments.It has an automatic awning which will allow you to enjoy it at any time of the day. This terrace also has access from the distributor of the plant. Other features to highlight: - Top quality materials in its construction. - Wi-fi on all floors. - Towel radiators in bathrooms. - Great light. - Home automation installed. - Alarm installed. - Heating by means of underfloor heating which favors the entire useful surface of its partitions as well as creating a great atmosphere of comfort and energy savings. - Hot water through city gas. - JATOBA floating wood parquet in a large part of the house except in the kitchen, bathrooms and semi-basement floor, which are stoneware, and in the stairs leading to the floors, which are granite. - Air conditioning throughout the house except in the cellar. - Split cold heat pump on the ground floor under cover. - Smooth walls. - White lacquered doors. This is the house you have always dreamed of in an unbeatable location and worthy of highlighting in each and every one of its aspects.You sure love it. Don't hesitate to call me and we'll talk!

description: We present you our new building, we present CARMEN, a project of 18 homes in an enviable location in our city where well-being and comfort continue to reign as in all our promotions. The 18 homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms are arranged in 7 heights and with different typologies where it is worth highlighting the penthouses on the ground floor and the duplex penthouses with their large solarium terraces and their private pools. All homes have their double garage for dependent use and a storage room. Likewise, on the top floor, you will find an outdoor Skypool community pool with a terrace from where you can enjoy the views of the city. On the ground floor, an equipped gym and a wellness area with a Finnish sauna and an aromatic shower will make your day-to-day a unique experience where relaxing will be easier than ever. The homes will have the highest standards in terms of energy efficiency so that comfort and savings are a reality: Air conditioning systems using underfloor heating and cooling by aerothermal energy, controlled mechanical ventilation with heat recovery, exterior carpentry with triple glazing, insulation thicknesses between 15 and 18cm and air tightness. The interiors of each home, with quality materials and exceptional design, are the perfect conclusion that make the project a complete and harmonious set of well-being, comfort, quality and design.

description: Do you dream of living in a Duplex-Penthouse and spectacular views? It's time, make your dreams come true, quality of life in this unique duplex-penthouse Located in Torres de San Lamberto Urbanization, right next to the Urbanization sports area, tennis courts, basketball courts, soccer, and the Urbanization pool, of which you have to be a member, Church and the main street of the urbanization, Silveria Fañanas, with restaurant, pharmacy, bar, large park and children's play area services and the prestigious San Alberto Magno School (also called the German School) which in 2021 has once again positioned itself among the 100 best schools of Spain, and among the 10 best private schools in Zaragoza. Housing distributed over 3 floors: Low level: We enter a spectacular, very spacious and bright living room, with three different rooms, a dining room, a living area and a reading area, each of them very spacious and spacious, and access to a beautiful terrace with views of the horizon. From the living room we directly access the kitchen, spacious, independent and with space for a laundry area. Finally, on this floor we have a courtesy toilet in which the water softener machine for the whole house is located. 1st floor: We access this floor through a stylish and wide staircase flown from the living room and here we find a charming distributor for the; 6 bedrooms and 2 fully equipped bathrooms, both with bathtubs. 2nd floor: This floor is special, go up, close your eyes and start creating your ideal space, a great room where we can make any dream come true, kitchen, office, gym...Not only that, we have a large terrace with dream views, Torre del Agua, Puente Siglo XXI, Estación Delicias...In short, the jewel of the house. Air conditioning in the living room through two splits and on the 2nd floor also through splits. In the same building and with direct access to the house, two large parking spaces, both in front of the elevator. A 20-square-meter local-storage room is included in the price, and the possibility of a second 20-square-meter local-storage room is also offered, also on the street level, by the main entrance of the building. The Torres de San Lamberto Urbanization has been classified as an Urban Complex of Interest.Zone C, grade 1 by the Zaragoza City Council.It has all the services, excellent communication with the center of Zaragoza, five minutes from the Delicias Station and 15 minutes from the Zaragoza Airport, with a unique aesthetic, next to the Mirabueno neighborhood and all its services. description: Masquehogares offers you a unique home! If you want a unique, different, spacious, very bright home with impressive 360º views, keep reading. In the Amelia Urbanization, at the top of Cuarte de Huerva, with incredible views, we find this TRIPLEX. We access the house on the 4th floor (it really is the 3rd, without a lift), where we access a spectacular 80-square-meter living room, with several areas and an original designer fireplace. On this same floor we have a large kitchen of more than 20 meters, with a pantry and a laundry area. We also have a terrace of about 12 meters. A bathroom with shower completes the floor. This floor is characterized by its enormous number of windows, with all orientations and a large amount of light. On the upper floor we would have the wonderful suite. With a first office area, almost 25 meters long, which gives access to the bedroom, which has an integrated bathroom, with an area for a large bathtub. Again this area has a lot of glass area, both from the bed and from the bathtub area there are wide and clear views. Who doesn't want a bath with wonderful views? Finally, the lower floor has 4 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The urbanization in which it is located has large and well-kept gardens, with a swimming pool for adults and children. It also has 3 community barbecues. It has a storage room, ideal for storing bicycles or hammocks for the pool area. Community fees are 160 euros / month. Do not miss the opportunity to have a unique home.

description: Are you looking for an apartment with a terrace and elevator in Zaragoza? You just found it: take a look at the 3D tour and fall in love with this ready-to-live-in apartment with elevator in Mercado San Valero. This useful 81 m² apartment in Marcelino Unceta is ready to become your home. The building is in very good condition, brand new, with a renovated portal, with a lift to ground level (a detail that you will surely appreciate when moving and when you return from the supermarket), it has an intercom, garbage collection and video surveillance. The house is distributed in 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living room and kitchen. It has a bathtub, electrical appliances and a terrace. The first thing you find is the 15 m² living room, with a very large window through which spectacular light enters. If you liked the living room, wait until you see the kitchen. In the kitchen, with its 12 m², there is plenty of space to place a small table where you can have breakfast, lunch and dinner comfortably It is fully equipped and the space is used very well, look how many closets! You will not lack space to store everything you need. Best of all, the kitchen opens onto the terrace. Do you like plants? Here they will grow wonderfully! The bathroom is a 7 m² cucada fully equipped with a very spacious and comfortable bathtub. Have you seen the master bedroom of nothing more and nothing less than 14 m².? Waking up in this room you will love thanks to its windows, all natural light. Last but not least impressive are the 13m² and 12m² bedrooms, which have plenty of space to make them the gym, study or dressing room you've always wanted. The qualities of this brand new apartment are not far behind: The walls are smooth. The doors are made of beautiful and modern wood. Have you noticed the ground? It is parquet in the living room and porcelain in the rest of the house. The PVC windows, double glazing will make you forget about the cold days of Zaragoza. The heating is natural gas central with an individual meter and radiators in all rooms: always warm! The area has all the services one step away: - Bus lines: 24. - Alcampo supermarket right in front of the house. And what community expenses does this stomp have? Well, only €52.61 (yes, you read that right). After this, are you going to stay without visiting this opportunity? Call us and schedule a visit without obligation right now, we know that it will not last long! At Doctor Property we help you at every step of the purchase: Do you need financing? We find the mortgage with the best conditions for you.This way you save time going from bank to bank. Save yourself endless calls to move supplies to your new home.We take care of changes of ownership and, if you want, to find the best offers for you to save on your bills. We take care of all the contracts and procedures and accompany you to the notarial signature.Then all that remains is to celebrate! In addition, you will know the amount of our services from the first moment so that there are no surprises.

description: Continuing with our maxim of Water, Light and Life, Malui Building is born. A state-of-the-art building designed to make your day-to-day life and that of your family a unique experience. The areas for common use culminate on the roof of the building with a communal outdoor pool, the ideal place to enjoy a bath under the stars. Malui Building is made up of 19 homes with different types, you can find penthouses on the ground floor, duplex penthouses and flats on the ground floor. description: We propose you an opportunity to buy this penthouse located in the Historic Center of the city. The building is an old Aragonese Renaissance palace from the 16th century, classified as a building of cultural interest (BIC). Its rehabilitation ended in 1990, obtaining various European and national awards for its good work in restoration and conservation. When you enter the courtyard of columns, it is as if time stopped and allowed you to isolate yourself from the outside for seconds to enjoy the space, the history, the light and the existing microclimate. The penthouse is made up of a large space, divided into three living areas and with a double space. Its windows are tilt-and-turn aluminum, velux and alabaster. Underfloor heating, air conditioning and non-decorative fireplace. The walls are Venetian stucco. The house is ready to adapt it to your liking. You can keep 2 or 3 bedrooms. description: Modernity and practicality are mixed in this house in the center of Zaragoza. Masquehogares offers completely renovated house in 2016, 95 meters useful with cozy terrace. The house is composed of impressive living room of almost 30 meters, outside Camino de las Torres, and with access to a balcony of about 5 meters.In the living room we have Split of hot and cold air conditioning Fujitsu brand. In the kitchen, white predominates, with custom-made designer furniture and Balay appliances, from the White Crystal Series.The 12 meters that the kitchen has, allow to have a large table to make life in it. From the kitchen we have access to terrace (14m), which was also completely renovated, with insulation and new tiling.Direct and indirect lighting was placed on the terrace, as well as water connections to facilitate cleaning and watering of plants. The master bedroom has 12 meters, with a large custom made closet of 3.30 meters. The other two bedrooms are 11 and 9 meters. The bathroom is a magazine, with limited edition ceramics, a Duravit suspended toilet with a hidden cistern; furniture of current design of the Yurba brand, with Gessi faucet.The bathtub is also Duravit, with Hansgrohe faucet, with large artichoke integrated in the bathroom ceiling, and with rain effect. Storage room of about 3 meters, inside the house, which was left prepared with water connections to be able to install a bathroom in the future. We have another closet or storage room inside the house of 1 m2. The reform was done conscientiously, taking care of all the details to the minimum and sparing nothing. The windows, with thermal break bridge of total isolation, folding and tilt-and-turn, with electric shutters. Insulation on ceilings with mineral wool, which allows sound insulation and thermal insulation. Doors lacquered in white.Completely change the electrical installation of the house, with Niessen switches and led bulbs.New plumbing, including the downspouts of the building.Thermostatic valves and new radiator wrenches were also placed. The floor is ceramic, imitation wood. The entrance door with Fichet lock. The heating is central, updated in 2018, with boiler and new pumps, with individual counter; Currently, thanks to improvements in home insulation, heating costs are minimal. The community, has the patio completely renovated, with hydraulic lift saves stairs.We have 2 elevators. The community has a porter.They also own the home of the goal. Do not miss this opportunity, call now to see it. We do not charge anything to the buyer.0% commission to the buyer. If you have to sell to buy, call now and we will find the best possible solution.

description: Formidable villa for sale on Carretera Valencia in front of Urbanization Santa Fe. Plot of 2,000 square meters with a constructed area of 704 m2. Distributed on two floors and cellar. First floor. - 55 m2 stately double-height living room with fireplace, 23 m2 kitchen-diner with auxiliary room with ironing area. Peculiar circular office, breaking the conventional lines of the house and illuminated by four large windows. Large bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobe. Storage area. Qualities: noble granite floor, the walls on this floor are made of vitrified exposed brick, as on the façade, thus giving it a special differentiating character. Second floor. - 3 double bedrooms, one single and a bathroom. The foundations of the bathrooms are made of pink Portuguese marble. Cellar. - It is accessed by a spiral staircase, in two areas separated by an arch: fireplace-grill and bar area. the ceiling with concrete beams lined with pine wood and the floor with a beautiful ceramic from Teruel. It has many perfectly integrated decorative elements that provide a lot of warmth Enclosure with aluminum sliding doors that allow you comfortable access to the garden areas and the house. Multifunctional room of about 30 m. dedicated to games and gym. Music room-workshop of about 70 m. well-known, previously it was dedicated to garages. Pool built with concrete walls lined with ceramic stoneware "Gressite", pool enclosure of 240 m, and the pool of 12mX6m. Glazed porch, with access through the kitchen from which you reach the recreation area with barbecue and beautiful pergola. The night vision of the pool illuminated from inside the water by large spotlights is a picture of great beauty and enjoyment, especially on warm summer nights. IT IS WORTH IT TO REQUEST OUR SALES DOSSIER!

description: Are you looking for a spacious, comfortable and bright house, in María de Huerva? You just found it: take a look at the 3D tour and fall in love with this semi-detached house, perfect to move into, built in 2005, with a garage and barbecue, in María de Huerva. This 160 m² built house in Rio Aguasvivas is ready to become your home. The house is distributed over 3 floors. On the ground floor you have a living room, kitchen, a toilet, a front garden with a barbecue, and a rear garden with a wood-burning oven. On the first floor, 3 bedrooms and a spacious and comfortable bathroom, and on the second floor, an attic with a nice terrace, one more toilet, and a storage room. When you enter through the main door of the urbanization, it is the first house you find.Accessing through the main garden, you will find space to park the car (you also have a motorized door which makes it even more practical) and of course a large patio or garden to set a table and enjoy a good barbecue with friends. Once inside the house, the first thing you find is the large 28 m² living room, very spacious and bright thanks to the huge window and the window on the side wall, since our house is semi-detached and all of it enjoys incomparable light. Do you like plants? Here they will grow wonderfully! Thanks to its southeast orientation. If you liked the living room, wait until you see the kitchen. Completely remodeled, we have sought to make the most of the available space, and with its 11.6 m² there is plenty of space to place a small table where you can have breakfast, lunch and dinner comfortably, It is fully equipped and the space is used very well, look how many closets! You will not lack space to store everything you need. Best of all, the kitchen opens onto another space, the back garden, where you can enjoy those breakfasts on the weekend, or take advantage of how cool summer nights are in this side of the house with a good barbecue in your oven. of firewoodyou imagine? The toilet is a 2.50 m² cucada to avoid waiting. Already on the first floor, you will find the two single rooms, 11.5 m² and 12 m², perfect for any use you want to give them. The main bathroom, (which is more than 6.5 m²), has a large shower tray perfect for two, yes! Have you seen the master bedroom? also with no more and no less than 11 m², and northeast orientation, which makes you love waking up in this room thanks to how bright and quiet it is. Finally, on the second floor, you have the attic, so you can use it as a fourth room, office, gym, or whatever you want, as it gives you access to a beautiful terrace and also has a toilet on the same floor, so you can do with her what you've always wanted. The qualities of this house are not far behind: -The walls are smooth. -The doors are made of wood, beautiful and modern. Have you noticed the ground? It is beautiful parquet, current and also very clean. -The PVC windows, double glazing will make you forget the cold days of Zaragoza. -The heating is individual natural gas and radiators in all rooms: always warm! It has ducted air conditioning to stay cool on summer days. And what community expenses does this couplet have? Well, only €26.00 (yes, you read that right). After this, are you going to stay without visiting this opportunity? Call us and schedule a visit without obligation right now, we know that it will not last long!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maria de Huerva
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Rio Aguasvivas

description: Many apartments for sale say that they are on Paseo de la Independencia but very few enter from Paseo Independencia itself.Very few.And this stately home that we are offering for sale is on Paseo Independencia itself, specifically at number 8, on the corner with Cinco de Marzo street.Building with three elevators and concierge. Many apartments for sale say that it has a good height, the one in this house is an excellent ninth height with large windows that offer us a panoramic view of Plaza España, Paseo de la Independencia and Plaza Aragón. Many apartments for sale claim to be next to the Corte Inglés, but very few are in front of the Corte Inglés and, as if that were not enough, in front of the emblematic La Equitativa building.A luxury for the view to enjoy from the living room of your house through the large windows overlooking the Paseo. A stately home for its location, spaciousness and light. In the property registry, the house is described as 188M2 built, with 158 useful. A raised plan is provided with the current distribution and measurements of each room A bedroom of about 20M2 A bedroom of about 18M2 A bedroom or office of almost 10M2 And a fourth suite-type bedroom with a bathroom with a 4.40M window, a 13.60M2 rest area and a large dressing room of about 12M2, which can become the fifth bedroom. The kitchen is renovated, unfurnished, so you can do it to your liking, about 18M2 with a service toilet. THE third bathroom with a window of almost 6M2 is independent from the bedrooms. A house with an excellent distribution as you can see on the plan, making the most of its surface, without wasted spaces. In summary: a kitchen, four bedrooms, living room, two bathrooms and a toilet.Everything you need to live comfortably. But the best thing about this apartment is what you can't buy if you don't have it: the light and sun that floods the house through the large windows that overlook Independencia.Especially in the mornings. At the moment it is used as an office.Through the infographics we have tried to distribute the spaces as housing, but the options are many.It will depend on what you need. We know that it is a very special property, of which there are not many to choose from and with an adjusted price for everything it offers us.

The house is in very good condition, perfectly ready to move into. The kitchen, completely renovated less than a year ago, has a very pleasant area with a dining table and views of the park. Bathroom with shower, also completely renovated less than a year ago. Master bedroom bathroom in marble with bathtub and exterior window. Built-in wardrobes in all rooms with all the doors changed. New and spacious wardrobe in the hallway. Terrace of more than 7 m2, totally oriented to the park, with awning and with direct access from the living room or the kitchen. Ducted air conditioning, central heating and hot water with individual meter, floating oak parquet flooring, oak doors and aluminum exterior carpentry with climalit double glazing. description: FOR SALE Semi-detached house, on Ctra.from Logroño, in front of Utebo and 10 kilometers from Zaragoza, in a gated community with a swimming pool, with an area of 500 m² of plot and 300 m² of garden. Its distribution is 3 floors, plus a garden area of 300 m² outside. STREET FLOOR: Porch and 45 m² covered garage for 3 cars with storage space and laundry area with washer and dryer; full kitchen with all appliances; 1 bathroom with shower, 1 room of 14 m², living room of 40 m² and with direct access to the garden that occupies an area of 300 m² with a tiled area of about 40 m² which is covered, (GAZEBO) as seen in the photographs, and being able to enjoy the outdoors as a family, resulting in a very cozy and usable area in all seasons of the year. The distribution used on this floor means that you have all the comforts of a flat, since having a room on the street level is a privilege. 300 m² garden, with trees, barbecue and a 4 m² storage room for tools and a natural well to irrigate the garden.   FIRST FLOOR: Distributed in 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all rooms being exterior and with windows to ventilate in the two bathrooms.All the rooms are bright and very spacious and 2 of them have fitted wardrobes.In addition, one of the rooms is a suite with a dressing room with a double built-in wardrobe and a bathroom equipped with a shower.In addition, from the main room there is access to a small terrace where the views are of the interior garden of our own home.The other bathroom in the corridor area is equipped with a bathtub. SECOND FLOOR: Large attic with sloping ceilings.The essence of this floor is its distribution that makes it seem like an independent flat, since it has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom installed with a shower, and a wide open unit of 35 m² that can be used as a living room, living room, games, work area, as a gym or even as another bedroom.It also has a terrace where the viewing angle is very wide. This villa has gas heating on all floors with aluminum radiators, hot-cold air conditioning in the living room.Exterior and interior carpentry in wood.Ceramic floors.Wooden access stairs to the floors.Video intercom and alarm system throughout the house with frequency inhibitor.It is important to highlight the possibility of being able to install solar panels for energy savings. The urbanization has large common areas; tennis, basketball, fronton, swimming pools and a social club, also ideal for all kinds of celebrations.The house, by space and distribution, is ideal for a family with children, very suitable as a second home for vacations or as a habitual residence. With a bus stop a few meters away and Alcampo, Lidl, Día and Mercadona supermarkets.All the space and comfort you need to improve your quality of life, where tranquility is assured.It is important to highlight the remodeling plan for the old N-232 in an urban walkway in the section between the Artybel roundabout and the Alcampo shopping center, which will undoubtedly make access more convenient, as well as the opening of a ALDI right next to the development.DO NOT HESITATE ANYMORE AND COME VISIT IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.

description: Spectacular house with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, with a large covered terrace and top quality finishes. In the best area of Miralbueno, Residencial Zigurat is a private urbanization with a unique design garden in the city. Conceived and designed as a work of art, it integrates living areas, a solarium, a playground for children, two swimming pools and a representative sculptural monument. It is an ideal place to live, with all the possibilities at your fingertips and without leaving the comforts that the big city offers you. Next to the Green Belt of Zaragoza, in an area equipped with large green areas and sports facilities. Very close to shopping centers, supermarkets, schools, nurseries, health centers, senior centers, pharmacies, etc. The house is built under high energy efficiency standards, achieving the highest rating currently possible "A". You will enjoy the most advanced technology to heat and cool the rooms, combining excellent insulation, windows with thermal break, aerothermal, underfloor heating and cooling and air renewal system with heat recovery. Thanks to these systems, we save a lot of energy without sacrificing comfort. All the materials chosen are of the highest quality and the constructive solutions have been carefully studied to guarantee great thermal and acoustic insulation. This is also reinforced by having interior partitions in ceramic brick. It comes with fitted wardrobes in the hall and bedrooms. The interior equipment is from the Porcelanosa group and Bosch brand appliances, which will give your home a premium and exclusive image. The home we offer you is top quality and is fully equipped to become your new home. Contact us! Notes: - Start of works first quarter 2022, approximate completion last quarter of 2023 - Prices include garage space and storage room. Second parking space optional. - VAT not included.

description: Two original houses joined.-purchase direct from the promoter.which makes it the only dwelling on the landing.Access through two doors, one being able to be used as a service door (next to the kitchen) and the other as a main entrance.Approximate built area: 210m2, useful 180m2, plus about 20m2 that were added by incorporating all the rear terraces.Distribution: 3 bedrooms + 3 bathrooms + 1 toilet + Kitchen + Laundry + living room + main hall. -The ground floor of the house becomes "round", which is very operative in the day-to-day dynamics, since, in the event that a room is occupied, you can always go through the other side and meters are not lost in distributor aisles. -ALL the house is COMPLETELY EXTERIOR, distributed in TWO ZONES, the DAY ZONE, to Paseo de Pamplona with a magnificent terrace of about 15 meters long, prepared with artificial grass.Easy maintenance and AT NIGHT, to the quiet Canfranc street, enjoying a very distant and clear perspective. -A complete reform was carried out with the highest qualities, in 2019.The housing concept for the reform was that of an "open house", with each of the bedrooms having its own bathroom en suite, with a separate toilet and bidet area, dressing room and free-standing bathtub in the main bedroom, large built-in showers with rain and hand accessory and chromotherapy in all bathrooms.The day area incorporates a living room-dining room-kitchen, with a large free-standing island built in Carrara marble, which allows coexistence adapted to current uses. -German oak flooring, large herringbone format throughout the house, large-format stone-effect porcelain tiles in the bathrooms.Motorized blinds with remote control, in the entire night area and sun protection screens, also motorized with remote control from the Cherubini brand, in the entire day area. -Boisseries distributed throughout the house, which in the living room incorporates the bookcase, in lacquered wood and with moldings. -Kitchen equipped with all high-end German appliances, Neff brand, with extractor hood integrated into the countertop and top-of-the-range American refrigerator, with ice/water dispenser.The laundry has a sink, washing machine, dryer and descending electric clothesline with light and air for quick drying. -Indirect LED lighting throughout the house, French decorative cornices, with intensity regulators.Renewed electrical installation, with recessed floor sockets with cover.RACK box for Modem installation.All the general lighting of the aesthetically cared for (tracks with magnet spotlights, recessed wall lights for passage, night lights, etc.). -Touch mirrors in bathrooms, selection of lights for makeup.The master bedroom with a large dressing room; the other two bedrooms, with wardrobes and separate shoe racks. -Doors made by a carpenter and lacquered, porcelain knobs, throughout the house, highlighting a door installed in a pivoting way, with a metal frame and wood drawing. -Armored entrance doors. -Metallic carpentry of the highest quality Cortizo brand, maximum thermal and acoustic insulation (thermal bridge breakage, 3+6mm), offer tilt openings. -Air-conditioning; Brand new ducted heating.Latest generation grids, Daikin brand, distributed in two independent zones (day-night). -The house is rented with a garage space, with the possibility of another additional one.

description: NEW PROMOTION OF NEW WORK NEXT TO THE IMPERIAL CANAL Promotion of seven homes on Calle Salvador Labastida, 16 - 18, next to the Imperial Canal and La Paz park, with homes from 49 m² to 82 m², with garage and storage room. Distributions to choose between 2 and 3 bedrooms, extraordinary private terraces of up to 50 m². The building is located in the upper part of the Torrero-La Paz neighborhood, where on both sides of the Imperial Canal you can find a multitude of natural areas, parks and squares. In the nearby area you can also find various educational facilities, sports or health centers, such as schools, institutes, nurseries, residences and both private and municipal sports centers. A perfect place to be able to surround yourself with nature and green areas, without losing the comforts of being in the urban center of Zaragoza. The building has good communication by road, through San Viator Street, Fourth Avenue, America Avenue, Paseo Cuellar and Paseo Colón, which communicate with the city center and the third belt. There are also different public transport stops that communicate with the entire city. Homes of excellent quality, high energy efficiency, Energy Certification A, fully equipped and customizable. Air conditioning through individual Aerotermina boilers with maximum comfort through underfloor heating and cooling systems. Energy saving through Aerothermal Boilers, mechanical ventilation with heat recovery, building surrounded by an envelope of high thermal capacities. Kitchens with finishes to choose from, fully furnished and with all electrical appliances, fridge, microwave, oven, ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Bathrooms with a porcelain finish to choose from, sink with cabinet, toilet, bathtub and shower. Rooms with fitted wardrobes, dresses and shelves. Prices include parking space and storage room. The building has three duplex penthouses with large terraces, two houses on the first floor with terraces inside and two ground floors with large terraces on both facades. Prices include storage room and garage. Carefully selected materials that guarantee the comfort of the home: underfloor heating and cooling, heat recovery and high-performance carpentry. Configurable homes, we offer the possibility of adapting the home to suit the client at no additional cost with different finishes such as: floors, bathrooms, kitchens, paintings, etc.

suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle Salvador Labastida, 16

address: Calle de San Antonio María Claret
description: Fincas Montecarmelo offers an unbeatable apartment for sale, it has 79 useful m2, distributed in 2 bedrooms (2 doubles), living room, kitchen and bathroom. The house is completely ready to move into. It stands out for its excellent state of conservation, with a series of improvements recently made: PARQUET floors, PVC exterior carpentry with CLIMALIT glass, and INTEGRAL REFORM of the main bathroom and AA/CC throughout the house. The farm has an elevator to LEVEL ZERO, and with community fees -€58/month-. As a complement to the house, a GARAGE PLACE is included in the price, for a large car, with easy access and maneuverability. The parking is located is located in the same building with direct descent by elevator. Ideal home for families looking for the benefits of residing in one of the most emblematic and demanded areas of Zaragoza, surrounded by all kinds of essential services: it is located less than 20 m. from Avenida de Goya and the tram stop. Its privileged geolocation, next to the San Francisco University Campus -less than 300m. - and the Circular 1 bus stop that connects with the Delicias Intermodal Station, makes it also suitable for the profile of an investor interested in making rents for students profitable. Fincas Montecarmelo you will find us at Calle Cortes de Aragon, 46 Zaragoza.

Exterior, SOUTH orientation. Finca with elevator. The price includes a parking space in the same building. Spacious homes with spacious rooms, with well-studied distributions, with large terraces conceived as one more part of the home, with quality PORCELANOSA finishes and, of course, ENERGY EFFICIENT.Those are VILLUM's homes. description: ZALFONADA - SALVADOR ALLENDE. Floor of 85.28 useful m². Composed of 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and 2 bathrooms (one with a bathtub and the other with a shower). Terrace with access from the living room. You can make a virtual visit by clicking on the additional link that appears at the end of the ad. Exterior, facing south and east. Marble and tile floors. Simple monoblock windows in light gray lacquered aluminum with double glass (Isolar Glas). The windows also have mosquito nets. Central heating and ACS with individual meter, by means of two low-temperature boilers fed with piped natural gas. AA/CC split with heat pump in the living room. The price also includes a 24.30 m² garage space and a 14.49 m² storage room, both located on the same property. Farm with communal area, consisting of benches to rest and children's area with swings. Excellent location, with a multitude of nearby services: schools, food stores, pharmacy. Very well connected to access the entrances and exits of the city, linked to long-distance highways, with destination Huesca, Barcelona, Soria, Madrid.

description: Residencial Patio Los Naranjos is an urbanization in the best location of Arcosur, in front of the golf course, next to Valdespartera and Montecanal in Pico de las Tempestades street, angular to Avenida Patio de los Naranjos number 17 and has a swimming pool and a large area common. This new promotion consists of 78 homes, garages and storage rooms and with the best possible orientation in this new neighborhood in the south of Zaragoza (SOUTH-EAST). All the houses are 98 m2 and have 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large living rooms, large terraces and have a garage and storage room. These homes are fully equipped with excellent qualities, maximum energy rating "A", which provides significant energy savings. In addition, they can customize their home between different styles with combinations of floors, doors and finishes. Residencial Patio Los Naranjos, will complete, together with phase 1 that we have already started construction on, a beautiful urbanization with a total of 144 homes, around an extensive park and open natural space. Direct connection with the bus stop for line 59 and tram, and with easy access by car to the Z-40 and practically next to the Integrated Public School. SEE OUR PRICES AND COMPARE. You can choose some houses on the ground floor with spectacular terraces. RESERVE YOUR HOME NOW!
