description: LICENSE GRANTED, NEXT START. The Respira Building consists of 9 customizable homes, with a storage room and garage included in the price. These are bright 3-bedroom homes with large terraces, in different types such as duplexes with an attic, duplexes with a cellar or flats on the ground floor. Being a boutique development, they will be customizable homes. Due to their location they have lighting and cross ventilation on both sides of the house. The homes are finished with the best qualities, fitted wardrobes, kitchens equipped with high-efficiency appliances, full bathrooms, low-consumption lighting, pre-installation of a plug-in hybrid or electric car charger in garages. Visit our website to see different options at The facilities have been designed with the highest energy efficiency, with underfloor heating and ducted air conditioning, thus achieving optimal comfort at all times of the year with the lowest possible consumption. The Respira Building is located to the north of the La Paz neighborhood, next to the Paseo del Canal park. A privileged environment that offers multiple opportunities; On the one hand, you will enjoy a quiet residential area, surrounded by a renovated natural space, the largest green ring in Zaragoza. On the other hand, the houses are well connected to the urban center and the main exits from the city thanks to transport. Very close you will find essential services such as a nursery, school, municipal sports centers, health center, pharmacies, supermarkets or local shops. In addition, the Respira Building is a 5-minute drive from the Puerto Venecia shopping center, so the leisure options increase.

description: From Pegaso Asociados we offer a spectacular home in the Parque Miraflores area, located at Calle De Aliaga nº 7, a few meters from Av. San José, completely renovated except for the bathrooms. Farm built in the year 1994, with 102 m2 built and 90 m2 useful. It consists of 3 bedrooms, the main one with a double bed, an en-suite bathroom and a large dressing room; the remaining 2 with single beds. Full bathrooms with bathtubs in both. Spacious bright living room with direct access to the terrace overlooking a garden area. Fully equipped kitchen, with a design reform and direct access to a gallery with enclosure and tilt-and-turn windows. Parquet flooring and marble tile, lacquered beech wood doors, hot and cold air pump, ducted air conditioning, physical concierge and excellent direct elevators to the floor. Wide and comfortable access to the garage and storage room in the same building with direct access from the elevator included in the price. €319,990. Do not miss the opportunity and come and see a magnificent home to move into a few meters from the city center without any commitment!

description: Housing on the eighth floor of a building located in one of the best areas of Zaragoza.Located in the most representative street of the Aragonese capital, we can get hold of a home that gives the possibility of carrying out a spectacular reform to the owner's taste, with practically unlimited options in its distribution. In the heart of Zaragoza, on Paseo Independencia, the nerve center of the city.In its surroundings there are all kinds of services: business centers, financial entities, shops, bars and restaurants, businesses, public transport, etc.Its last use has been an office, but registered as a home.It has air conditioning through ducts, and exterior views of Paseo Independencia, Plaza España and Calle Cinco de Marzo.Possibility of carrying out several housing projects, since it is currently almost diaphanous, or of rebuilding the original house, which consisted of: Lobby, three bedrooms, dining room/living room, two bathrooms, office, kitchen and office or another bedroom. On the EIGHTH floor of a luxury building with 3 elevators and a concierge, you will find this wonderful 201 m2 totally exterior property with very good light thanks to its large floor-to-ceiling windows on both facades of the building; The windows are climalit, which together with the orientation of the house, offer exceptional light and insulation.It has a water meter and a panel for electrical installations inside the property, and it is current.Central heating by radiators and air conditioning by ducts and Split.Armored door.The apartment, located in an exceptional building with 30 homes, has a doorman and 3 elevators at ground level, allowing accessibility for people with reduced mobility. But if this property stands out in something, it is in its perfect location.In front of the English Court, in one of the most prestigious streets in the entire city, with the best hotels (Palafox, Gran Hotel de Zaragoza, etc.) and next to Plaza España and the recently renovated Plaza de Santa Engracia.This property, full of quality, space and luxury, is the opportunity you have been waiting for to work in the very center of the city and provide the best service to your clients.Very commercial area, with a tram, taxi and bus stop in front of the portal and nearby public car parks. The description and information of the advertisement is merely informative and non-binding; it is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual.

description: FOR SALE Very bright penthouse, in a university area, completely renovated to move into. It is distributed in 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and 1 bathroom. It should be noted that it is a very well distributed house, with very little corridor and where the main protagonist is light, giving a very comfortable environment. The two bedrooms are spacious and have fitted wardrobes. The kitchen is complete with all appliances. The living room is installed with hot-cold air conditioning and the viewing angle from the window is very wide. The bathroom equipped with a shower with screen, bidet and heated towel rail, as well as having a window for ventilation. Qualities: -White lacquered aluminum windows, some tilt-and-turn with mosquito net. - Armored entrance door. - Interior doors in wood - Wood laminate flooring except in kitchen and bathroom which are ceramic - Hot-cold air conditioning in the living room. Ceiling fan in the main room. - Central heating with individual meter. - Built-in wardrobe in the rooms and in the corridor area. - Wall facings smoothed with some contrast in paper. It is a 9-storey building with 3 neighbors per floor up to the 7th and with 2 neighbors on the 8th and 9th floor. The portal has video surveillance and is completely renovated, it does not have architectural barriers since there is a platform to save the stairs and it is an economic community paying a community fee of 50.76 euros, which makes it very interesting for investors who want to rent it later. Although it does not have a garage, it can be found for rent in the surroundings. Its location in the heart of the university center means that you have all kinds of services around you, not lacking for anything. DO NOT THINK ABOUT IT ANYMORE AND COME VISIT IT.

Located in the vicinity of shopping centers, surrounded by all kinds of services and facilities around it and a few meters from parks, a health center, schools.. . and perfectly connected to the rest of the city by bus, tram or bike path. The house occupies an area of more than 97m2, and is distributed in 4 bedrooms, 2 complete bathrooms, a living-dining room with direct access to a splendid terrace, a fully equipped kitchen. The building is part of a large urbanization very close to the tram and the Carrefour shopping center, and was built in 2002. It is a very bright house, a ninth floor facing south, which allows light to enter directly all day. The living-dining room is large, with a large window that gives access to one of the terraces with views of the main avenue and from where you can see the Pilar towers. The kitchen is fully equipped and in perfect condition, having access to a second terrace where the heating boiler is installed, it is furnished with cupboards above and below and equipped with all electrical appliances. Continuing down the corridor, we find a complete bathroom with a bathtub, and four bedrooms, two of them double with built-in wardrobes for maximum use of space. The main room, suite type, has a full bathroom with a shower tray and a built-in wardrobe. The house is in excellent condition, with aluminum exterior carpentry and wood interior in very good condition. The floors are top quality marble. Heating and individual gas hot water. description: Can you imagine living in a privileged enclave next to the Jose Antonio Labordeta Park and equipped with all the essential services, such as supermarkets, bus and taxi stops, pharmacies, savings banks, schools, etc... ? Beautiful house for sale, very bright, on Calle Arzobispo Morcillo, in the Ruiseñores area, one of the quietest areas of Zaragoza, Urbanization 'Las Adelfas' has a concierge, a swimming pool with a green area and a terrace area, two squash courts, a tennis court, a social room for celebrations and meetings, a gym and an indoor basketball court. The house has approximately 250 m2 and is distributed over 4 floors, distributed as follows: In the basement, there is a large garage; a cellar with a table for 12 people, a cupboard, a built-in fireplace, wood and bottle racks, all made with exposed brick and a very large storage room, currently used as a pantry and storage room. The cellar and storage room, despite being in a basement, have natural light, thanks to the central English patio. The floors of this plant are stoneware from Aragon. On the first floor, or street level, there is a hall that means that the door of the house is not directly exposed to the street; a living room with a visible staircase from which you can access a good-sized terrace, a fully renovated kitchen and a toilet with a small bathtub. In this room there is Panasonic brand air conditioning. Both the floors on this floor and those on the second floor are high-traffic Pergo brand laminate flooring. On the second floor there is a hall from which you can access 4 bedrooms (three of them with a built-in wardrobe) and a completely renovated bathroom with a hydromassage cabin. In the main bedroom there is Panasonic air conditioning. On the third floor there is a living room with a Velux window and black and white built-in wardrobes to match the furniture in the room; an office with a Velux window; custom-made library in white (both the furniture in the living room and the office were made to measure by a cabinetmaker); a toilet with sink and toilet and window and a built-in wardrobe. The floors of this plant are wooden. In the two rooms on this floor there is air conditioning. Heating with individual gas boiler. The exterior carpentry of the house is made of wood and is in perfect condition.

description: Impressive duplex penthouse in one of the best areas of the city. It is a spectacular 2-story house located at the beginning of Avenida Salvador Allende, one of the quietest and most peaceful residential areas of the city. In its surroundings we can find supermarkets, parks and gardens (Uncle Jorge), schools and institutes, medical centers, commercial areas, restaurants and terraces, food stores. In addition, it has fantastic access to the ring roads and exits from the city... All this just twenty minutes walk from Plaza del Pilar. The house is divided into two floors of 106 m2 each, having on the upper floor a terrace with a "bodega" type enclosure of more than 80 m2 and a barbecue, the value of which cannot be calculated in money, since it is the dream of any lover In addition, in the closed space on the upper floor we can find a complete studio with a fully equipped kitchen, the possibility of making a bathroom (downspouts) and a sleeping area. On the lower floor we find the independent kitchen (with dining room and gallery), the living room with its own terrace, 3 double bedrooms (one en suite with bathroom and access to the upper terrace) and a large bathroom. The upper floor, whose indescribable charm can only be appreciated through images or in situ, has been created by and for the exclusive enjoyment of its owners. It has an outdoor solarium-type area with a barbecue, a table with an awning and an impressive vegetation made up mostly of palm trees. Its interior area, in addition, is distributed in several areas: cellar-type dining room, bar area with kitchen and bar and rest area. If you want to live in an authentic oasis of peace, in a property with incalculable added value, do not miss this jewel and contact us to visit it.

description: Incredible high standing PENTHOUSE, with spectacular views and BRAND NEW, in the heart of ROMAREDA! The building is located on Vázquez de Mella street, a few meters from the Miguel Servet Hospital, the Romareda soccer field, the Aragonia shopping center, and the Jesuit school. That is, in the most demanded and exclusive area of the city. Its privileged location gives it very easy access to the Z-30 and Z-40 ring roads, which connect the different exits of the city of Zaragoza; and the tram has a stop a few meters away. It is a complex of high-rise buildings that were built completely new in 2003, respecting the facades and aesthetics of the rest of the urbanization. Therefore, your purchase WOULD INCLUDE VAT AT 10%, as it is considered NEW WORK and first transmission. It has a garden area for common use, completely fenced, within the building development itself. The PENTHOUSE is located on the 12th floor. The height gives spectacular views to both the house and its huge terrace: they enjoy a 360º panoramic view where you can see the entire city, including the Pine Forests of Venice, the largest natural lung in the urban area. The 114 useful meters that make up the house enjoy two geographical orientations: north and south (the best of the possible combinations). They are distributed in a spacious living room of more than 30 meters with a terrace; fully equipped kitchen, with all brand new appliances and with access to gallery; 4 bedrooms, all with built-in oak wardrobes fully dressed, and two full bathrooms with hydromassage column. The qualities used in the construction of the house are luxurious: natural wood on the floors and doors, high-end Teka appliances, tilt-and-turn aluminum windows, electric shutters in the main rooms, cast-iron radiators with a gas boiler, and air conditioning by ducts throughout the house. On the upper floor, we can enjoy a terrace of more than 100 square meters, with the possibility of glazing an area, which has electricity, water and television outlets, in order to add a recreation area to the attic. The house has a linked storage room and offers an OPTIONAL parking space with easy access. If you want to enjoy one of the best and most exclusive penthouses in Zaragoza, and also completely brand new, do not hesitate to contact us.

We have just renovated it: the electrical installation, plumbing, the kitchen (with new furniture and new appliances), the bathroom in its entirety, the laminate flooring in the entire house except the kitchen and bathroom, which are ceramic; We have also raised some ceilings modernizing it and making it more welcoming. Building WITH ELEVATOR (great size) and is located AT THE BEGINNING of Compromiso de Caspe. Access to the patio and elevator from the street is on level ground, without stairs or architectural barriers, which makes habitability easier for everyone (baby carriages, wheelchairs, etc. ). Very consolidated area, with shops, supermarkets, schools, civic center and very close to the center (walking, 7 minutes from Plaza de San Miguel and 10 minutes from Plaza de los Sitios). It is a 1st floor, but since there is a main floor in the building, it makes it a 2nd floor. It is interior and for the most part overlooks a large, bright courtyard. The kitchen overlooks an open patio on its side. As for the garage, it is not part of the sale price of this house, but there is the possibility of using a garage space for a large car, with a separate price.

description: Impressive duplex penthouse with infinity pool in the heart of Vía Hispanidad. It is located at the entrance to Miralbueno, specifically in the spectacular pre-owned development "Edificio Iris", built in 2016. This complex, completely fenced and equipped with a concierge and all kinds of 24-hour security systems, is one of the most prestigious new-build developments that have been built in recent years, making Miralbueno one of the most sought-after areas in the city. It has all kinds of luxuries and amenities to be able to enjoy indoor and outdoor sports without having to leave the estate: outdoor pool, spa, full gym with "Technogym" machines, paddle tennis court, children's area... The penthouse is a luxury home distributed over two floors of more than 80 useful meters.An authentic whim of a home designed and built with impeccable taste and built with the best qualities that we can currently find on the market. The air conditioning system is through aerothermal energy, an efficient system that takes advantage of the ambient energy from the outside air to transform it into cooling in summer, heating in winter and hot water throughout the year.All this through a system of underfloor heating, completely ecological and that allows obtaining savings of more than 70% in annual energy.essential in the current energy context... In addition, all climalit-type enclosures with double glazing and thermal break have been reinforced by doubling the double window, so that the energy efficiency of the home, due to the zero heat loss, is optimal. Apart from the benefits of the house on a technical level, it has also undergone a series of aesthetic and functional improvements by the property that provide it with greater comfort.Among others, the kitchen was joined to the living room, providing it with an island and expanding its furniture, and a large dressing room was also created in what made up the third bedroom (it could easily be returned to its origin if necessary). For this reason, on the lower floor of the house we find a living room - kitchen facing east (morning sun) and a terrace, 2 double bedrooms (one of them with a dressing room in what was originally the third bedroom) and also a terrace on the the main one, 2 full bathrooms and laundry room. We also find from the hall of the house the access staircase to the impressive terrace on the upper floor.In it there are several areas and environments: chill-out pergola area, barbecue, solarium with shower...and most impressive of all: an infinity pool with an unbeatable 360º panoramic view.Its views and the indescribable sensation of bathing in it, is even better at sunset and at night. The house also includes two double-size garage spaces with easy access, as well as a storage room located at the back of one of them. If you are looking for a dream penthouse in a premium area of Zaragoza, do not hesitate to contact us.

description: Opportunity to acquire a house with a large corral in Villanueva de Gállego, 15 minutes from Zaragoza. The house is made up of a single floor with 4 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom, a garage and a corral. In case of wanting to carry out a new construction, the ordinances are the following: Low-density urban land intended, among its main uses, for a single-family home. The conditions of the plot allow the construction of a single-family semi-detached house of 300m2 with a façade of 10 linear meters or a grouped single-family house of 150m2 per house with a minimum façade of 5.75 linear meters. Its permitted building area is: -Basement below ground level with a maximum allowable buildability of 80% (264 m2) -Three floors (Lower + 2) with a buildable area of 50% (165m2) Total allowed, 495m2 with a maximum facade height of 10 meters The coefficient of buildability is 1.25m2 / m2 (412.50m2) except in the case that the use of the floor is intended as a garage, that the allowed buildability is 1.50m2 / m2 (495m2) If you want more information about the house or make a visit without obligation, do not hesitate to contact us by calling us at or visiting our office located at Calle Perena 5 de Zuera (Zaragoza).

description: FOR SALE Villa, on the Carretera de Logroño, a few kilometers from Zaragoza, in a gated community with a swimming pool, with a 500 m² plot and a large outdoor area.Its state of conservation is so extremely good that it is ready to move into. Its distribution on 3 floors is unbeatable: STREET FLOOR: Very well-kept porch with a garden area with fruit trees and space for parking 1 car with a wooden deck; Covered garage for 2 cars with space for storage and a large loft; kitchen with granite countertops, complete with all electrical appliances and very well distributed; 1 room that is currently used as a laundry and storage room; 1 bathroom with shower and a spacious 40 m² living room with direct access to the garden with a large covered terrace with a beautiful wooden structure, very cozy and usable in all seasons of the year.The outdoor area is very well maintained, with palm trees, a tiled area and on the other hand a landscaped area with automatic irrigation, a cabin for storing tools and a natural well, (EVERYTHING IN MAXIMUM DETAIL).It also has a barbecue where you can enjoy pleasant evenings. FIRST FLOOR: Distributed in 4 very spacious rooms and 2 bathrooms.All exterior and very bright units.One of the rooms is a suite with a dressing area with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom with a bathtub, it also has access to a covered terrace with a wooden structure that overlooks the garden.There are 2 other rooms that also have fitted wardrobes.The other bathroom is located in the corridor area very close to the other rooms and is installed with a shower. SECOND FLOOR: Large attic where we find a large open unit of 43 m² that can be used as a bedroom, living room, games room...Or it is possible to get 2 rooms and a bathroom since the pipes are raised to facilitate its realization.It also has a terrace where the viewing angle is very wide.It should also be noted that this floor has heating with radiators and hot-cold air conditioning with the installation of 2 splits. As for the qualities, this villa has individual gas heating on all floors with iron radiators and hot-cold air conditioning through sectorized ducts on the street floor and first floor.Wooden exterior carpentry with installation of mosquito nets and with water drains on all windows lined with ceramic and marble; interior carpentry with wooden doors.Marble floors on the street level, hydraulic effect flooring in the kitchen and wooden flooring on the first floor and ceramics in the attic.Stone tile floors on the porch and the stairs to access the wooden floors.Wooden covered terraces that give a lot of warmth to the house.Video intercom and alarm system.It is important to highlight the possibility of installing solar panels for energy savings. The urbanization has large common areas, tennis, basketball, racquetball, swimming pool and social club, also ideal for all kinds of celebrations.The house, by space and distribution, is ideal for a family with children, very suitable as a second home for vacations or as a habitual residence. With a bus stop a few meters away and Alcampo, Lidl, Día and Mercadona supermarkets.All the space and comfort you need to improve your quality of life, where tranquility will be the main protagonist.It is important to highlight the remodeling plan for the old N-232 in an urban walkway in the section between the Artybel roundabout and the Alcampo shopping center, which will undoubtedly make access more convenient, as well as the opening of a ALDI right next to the development.DO NOT HESITATE ANYMORE AND COME VISIT IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.

Its location is very good due to its proximity to Fernando el Católico and Parque Grande, the great lung of Zaragoza. description: When you decided that you wanted to buy an attic, you were very clear about what you were looking for: a large terrace area, with great privacy, good orientation and unobstructed views.A good interior layout, spacious in all rooms of the house.And that it was in a recent building, with a garage, and in an excellent location, ideally in the center of your city.The problem came when nothing you saw fulfilled your wishes.Until today.Read on and get ready to meet your new home… The penthouse is located on Calle Asalto, in an environment that combines the history of Zaragoza, with the medieval wall embracing the building, the culture of the Centro de Historias, the modernity of the El Trovador Business Center and the nature of the splendid Parque Bruil.All this 10 minutes walk from the Plaza de España or the Plaza del Pilar. The penthouse has a closed useful area of 149 m2, plus a total terrace area of 68 m2, which makes a total of 217 m2 useful. Entering, on the right hand side, we find the office kitchen, of about 20 m2, perfectly conditioned and equipped.The office area has sloping ceilings, giving a special warmth to the daily family gatherings at meal times.Next, from the hall we access the magnificent 40 m2 living room, very bright, perfect for furnishing in two rooms, differentiating the living area from the dining room.Below are three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite in the master bedroom.Two bedrooms have an area of approximately 12 m2, while the main one has 24 m2, which includes a large dressing room.Initially, the house had four bedrooms.One of them joined the room.If you want to restore it, you would simply have to make this division with a simple partition.In addition, there is still an additional space.It is a wonderful office, 11 m2, very quiet and bright, which we access from the terraces.It is perfect as a telecommuting area, library or even as a play area for the little ones in the house. And we leave the two terraces for last.You have read well.You are not going to have a terrace as you have always dreamed of, but you are going to have two.To which more beautiful and usable.The first, 27 m2 and with access from the living room and the kitchen, facing southwest.The second even larger, 40 m2, with access from the living room, from the dining area and from the master bedroom, facing southeast and with indescribable views towards the Bruil park.So… where are you going to put the barbecue? The penthouse is sold together with a parking space located in the same building. Enjoy the detailed photographic report that we have prepared so that you can see all the details of the penthouse.Now there is only one thing left to know… When are we meeting to see it?

description: FOR SALE Villa, on the Carretera de Logroño, a few kilometers from Zaragoza, in a gated community with a swimming pool, with a 500 m² plot and a large outdoor area.Its state of conservation is so extremely good that it is ready to move into. Its distribution on 3 floors is unbeatable: STREET FLOOR: Very well-kept porch with a garden area with fruit trees and space for parking 1 car with a wooden deck; Covered garage for 2 cars with space for storage and a large loft; kitchen with granite countertops, complete with all electrical appliances and very well distributed; 1 room that is currently used as a laundry and storage room; 1 bathroom with shower and a spacious 40 m² living room with direct access to the garden with a large covered terrace with a beautiful wooden structure, very cozy and usable in all seasons of the year.The outdoor area is very well maintained, with palm trees, a tiled area and on the other hand a landscaped area with automatic irrigation, a cabin for storing tools and a natural well, (EVERYTHING IN MAXIMUM DETAIL).It also has a barbecue where you can enjoy pleasant evenings. FIRST FLOOR: Distributed in 4 very spacious rooms and 2 bathrooms.All exterior and very bright units.One of the rooms is a suite with a dressing area with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom with a bathtub, it also has access to a covered terrace with a wooden structure that overlooks the garden.There are 2 other rooms that also have fitted wardrobes.The other bathroom is located in the corridor area very close to the other rooms and is installed with a shower. SECOND FLOOR: Large attic where we find a large open unit of 43 m² that can be used as a bedroom, living room, games room...Or it is possible to get 2 rooms and a bathroom since the pipes are raised to facilitate its realization.It also has a terrace where the viewing angle is very wide.It should also be noted that this floor has heating with radiators and hot-cold air conditioning with the installation of 2 splits. As for the qualities, this villa has individual gas heating on all floors with iron radiators and hot-cold air conditioning through sectorized ducts on the street floor and first floor.Wooden exterior carpentry with installation of mosquito nets and with water drains on all windows lined with ceramic and marble; interior carpentry with wooden doors.Marble floors on the street level, hydraulic effect flooring in the kitchen and wooden flooring on the first floor and ceramics in the attic.Stone tile floors on the porch and the stairs to access the wooden floors.Wooden covered terraces that give a lot of warmth to the house.Video intercom and alarm system.It is important to highlight the possibility of installing solar panels for energy savings. The urbanization has large common areas, tennis, basketball, racquetball, swimming pool and social club, also ideal for all kinds of celebrations.The house, by space and distribution, is ideal for a family with children, very suitable as a second home for vacations or as a habitual residence. With a bus stop a few meters away and Alcampo, Lidl, Día and Mercadona supermarkets.All the space and comfort you need to improve your quality of life, where tranquility will be the main protagonist.It is important to highlight the remodeling plan for the old N-232 in an urban walkway in the section between the Artybel roundabout and the Alcampo shopping center, which will undoubtedly make access more convenient, as well as the opening of a ALDI right next to the development.DO NOT HESITATE ANYMORE AND COME VISIT IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.

description: Exceptional pre-owned penthouse in the Seminario Live Building, next to the Zaragoza City Hall, Vía Ibérica, Vía Hispanidad and Condes de Aragón. Small business, since it has the Casablanca neighborhood on the other side of Vía Hispanidad, and direct access to the Z-30 (Vía Hispanidad). Parque Grande José Antonio Labordeta is a fifteen minute walk away. It has a closed useful area of 88.79 m2 plus a large glazed terrace which is accessed from all rooms, almost 30 m2 with magnificent views and spectacular sunsets. It is distributed as follows: -entrance hall, 4´40 m2 -24'41 m2 living room with access to a 27'17 m2 terrace -11'46 m2 kitchen fully equipped with appliances (dishwasher, induction hob, extractor hood, refrigerator, oven and microwave) with access to the laundry area with a separate door -Three bedrooms: 15'70 m2 (with bathroom), 9'74 m2 and 10 m2, all with fitted wardrobes -Two bathrooms: one inside the main bedroom of 5'10 m2 with a bathtub and under-sink cabinet, and the secondary one of 4'73 m2, with a shower tray, screen and under-sink cabinet. As for the qualities and equipment: it has central heating with an individual meter, complete installation of ducted air conditioning, fitted wardrobes, parquet flooring, smooth paint, white lacquered interior carpentry, motorized blinds in the living room, etc. It has a large garage space and storage room of 8'26 m2. description: Some homes have their own soul, it seems that they are waiting for you and when you notice that feeling when you see it, it means that you have just found THE APARTMENT OF YOUR DREAMS! That will happen to you when you come to visit this WONDERFUL VILLA.In CUARTE, one of the best and most valued areas near the city, with a bus stop 50 meters away. A multitude of services, shops, sports areas, wide streets with large open spaces, surrounded by green areas and where relaxation and tranquility will inspire your new way of life. Beautiful SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE, surrounded on all sides by a large garden, where the light that illuminates its rooms is guaranteed throughout the day. We access through a spectacular glazed porch, where on sunny winter days it will surely become your favorite room. The house is divided into four floors. The ground floor is distributed in an elegant living room with large windows to the porch and the garden, a spacious fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and with access to the back of the garden and a charming toilet. Going up the stairs, on the first floor, we have four spacious rooms with their own personality, all of them with fitted wardrobes, where the main suite-type room with a full bathroom integrated in the bedroom and a second full bathroom for the rest of the rooms stand out. On the upper floor, we find the jewel in the crown.A bedroom with sloping ceilings, all clad in wood, with a dressing area and a bathroom integrated into the room with a sauna area.IDEAL We cannot forget the basement of the house, LA BODEGA, where you will surely have a great time with your family and friends enjoying all those celebrations by the fireplace, preparing your roasts in the wood oven with a good wine and surrounded by your loved ones. Next to the cellar, we have access to the garage, with capacity for THREE CAR SEATS and a storage area.Community garage but totally private since each farm has its spaces with its own shutters. DO YOU LIKE IT RIGHT? WE HAVE NOT THE SLIGHTEST DOUBT. Great qualities, parquet flooring, oak doors, ducted air conditioning throughout the house, prepared for minimum energy consumption for both cold and heat, with double climalit system shutters and extra reinforcement of radiators and elements, door armored, led lighting throughout the house, a perfectly maintained garden of about 300 meters… Thanks to the natural light that enters through its large windows, they reveal the true charm of this home, a warm and welcoming home where you can enjoy the rest of your whole family. Possibility of leaving some furniture in the house. Very good community, very quiet with great services in the common areas as they have a great swimming pool with a lifeguard surrounded by a large lawn, changing rooms, five-a-side football, paddle tennis, tennis and basketball courts. Don't wait any longer and come see it.YOU AND YOUR WHOLE FAMILY WILL LOVE IT! The spark will surely fly and you will know that you have found the HOUSE OF YOUR DREAMS.WE SPEAK?

description: When you decided that you wanted to buy an attic, you were very clear about what you were looking for: a large terrace area, with great privacy, good orientation and unobstructed views.A good interior layout, spacious in all rooms of the house.And that it was in a recent building, with a garage, and in an excellent location, ideally in the center of your city.The problem came when nothing you saw fulfilled your wishes.Until today.Read on and get ready to meet your new home… The penthouse is located on Calle Asalto, in an environment that combines the history of Zaragoza, with the medieval wall embracing the building, the culture of the Centro de Historias, the modernity of the El Trovador Business Center and the nature of the splendid Parque Bruil.All this 10 minutes walk from the Plaza de España or the Plaza del Pilar. The penthouse has a closed useful area of 149 m2, plus a total terrace area of 68 m2, which makes a total of 217 m2 useful. Entering, on the right hand side, we find the office kitchen, of about 20 m2, perfectly conditioned and equipped.The office area has sloping ceilings, giving a special warmth to the daily family gatherings at meal times.Next, from the hall we access the magnificent 40 m2 living room, very bright, perfect for furnishing in two rooms, differentiating the living area from the dining room.Below are three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite in the master bedroom.Two bedrooms have an area of approximately 12 m2, while the main one has 24 m2, which includes a large dressing room.Initially, the house had four bedrooms.One of them joined the room.If you want to restore it, you would simply have to make this division with a simple partition.In addition, there is still an additional space.It is a wonderful office, 11 m2, very quiet and bright, which we access from the terraces.It is perfect as a telecommuting area, library or even as a play area for the little ones in the house. And we leave the two terraces for last.You have read well.You are not going to have a terrace as you have always dreamed of, but you are going to have two.To which more beautiful and usable.The first, 27 m2 and with access from the living room and the kitchen, facing southwest.The second even larger, 40 m2, with access from the living room, from the dining area and from the master bedroom, facing southeast and with indescribable views towards the Bruil park.So… where are you going to put the barbecue? The penthouse is sold together with a parking space located in the same building. Enjoy the detailed photographic report that we have prepared so that you can see all the details of the penthouse.Now there is only one thing left to know… When are we meeting to see it?

description: Living in a chalet can be a wonderful experience for many reasons. Here are some of the benefits you could enjoy: 1. Space: Chalets are usually spacious, offering plenty of space both inside and out. This means you'll have plenty of space for you and your family, as well as your pets, plants, and whatever else you want. two. Comfort: In the chalets you can enjoy the tranquility and silence, as well as the nature that surrounds you. In addition, the chalets are usually very cozy homes, large windows and high ceilings that create a feeling of space and comfort. 3. Privacy: Living in a chalet offers you privacy, since you generally won't have very close neighbors. This means that you will be able to enjoy the tranquility and privacy that you desire without feeling observed by others. Four. Entertainment opportunities: Some villas have facilities such as swimming pools, tennis courts and golf courses, which means that you will have many opportunities for entertainment without having to leave the house. In this case, you will have next to your house, the sports hall and the swimming pools, as well as the Via Verde or the Canal de Zaragoza, ideal for walking or cycling. 5. Investment: Villas are usually a good investment, since their value tends to increase over time. Also, if you decide to rent your chalet when you are not using it, you will be able to generate additional income. In summary, living in a chalet can offer you a relaxed, comfortable and private living experience in a natural environment, as well as being a long-term investment. Having your own pool in your townhouse can offer comfort, privacy, maintenance control, additional value to your property, and save money in the long run. Where is the urbanization La Carrasca? It is behind La Floresta. La Floresta in Zaragoza is a quiet and peaceful residential area, well connected and with a wide range of services and amenities. In addition, this area is surrounded by green areas and open spaces, which means that you can enjoy an active and healthy life. Currently the area is in full real estate expansion that makes La Floresta an excellent option for those looking for a place to settle or invest in real estate.

description: Living in a chalet can be a wonderful experience for many reasons. Here are some of the benefits you could enjoy: 1. Space: Chalets are usually spacious, offering plenty of space both inside and out. This means you'll have plenty of space for you and your family, as well as your pets, plants, and whatever else you want. two. Comfort: In the chalets you can enjoy the tranquility and silence, as well as the nature that surrounds you. In addition, the chalets are usually very cozy homes, large windows and high ceilings that create a feeling of space and comfort. 3. Privacy: Living in a chalet offers you privacy, since you generally won't have very close neighbors. This means that you will be able to enjoy the tranquility and privacy that you desire without feeling observed by others. Four. Entertainment opportunities: Some villas have facilities such as swimming pools, tennis courts and golf courses, which means that you will have many opportunities for entertainment without having to leave the house. In this case, you will have next to your house, the sports hall and the swimming pools, as well as the Via Verde or the Canal de Zaragoza, ideal for walking or cycling. 5. Investment: Villas are usually a good investment, since their value tends to increase over time. Also, if you decide to rent your chalet when you are not using it, you will be able to generate additional income. In summary, living in a chalet can offer you a relaxed, comfortable and private living experience in a natural environment, as well as being a long-term investment. Having your own pool in your townhouse can offer comfort, privacy, maintenance control, additional value to your property, and save money in the long run. Where is the urbanization La Carrasca? It is behind La Floresta. La Floresta in Zaragoza is a quiet and peaceful residential area, well connected and with a wide range of services and amenities. In addition, this area is surrounded by green areas and open spaces, which means that you can enjoy an active and healthy life. Currently the area is in full real estate expansion that makes La Floresta an excellent option for those looking for a place to settle or invest in real estate.

description: Central apartment in Zaragoza, on Santa Isabel street, a few meters from Plaza del Pilar and Plaza de España. The property has a useful 79m, distributed in a spacious, bright living-dining room, 1 double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and another single bedroom.A full bathroom with a bathtub.And a fully equipped kitchen with ceramic hob, oven, extractor hood, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher and washing machine.It also has air conditioning in the living room and in the main bedroom.The heating is individual gas. The building has two elevators and a large indoor common area. Possibility of a good and large garage space for €32,000 and a storage room for €7000.All in the same building. Magnificent opportunity to live in the center of Zaragoza and for investors. If you want to see it, do not hesitate to contact us at 600 973 660.We will gladly assist you.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Alfonso, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Santa Isabel

description: Exclusive completely renovated house located in one of the best areas of the Neuralgic Center of Zaragoza, top floor, in the Plaza de Los Sitios with an enviable orientation, which provides it with an immense and cozy natural light that thanks to its large windows the use of is max.Upon entering the house we find a large and comfortable open space that invites us to stay.The exquisite design is thought out in detail to make the life of its occupants as comfortable as possible.We have to the left of the entrance the living area and living room in two rooms, the passage area divides the spectacular kitchen with a high-quality glass enclosure, in this way the kitchen is integrated into the open space of the house in a very smart.The designer kitchen has a central island and a flat, high-efficiency hood on the ceiling, the entire storage area and part of the appliances are paneled and built-in to make a work area as comfortable as possible, said kitchen is divided into two environments.Closing the Leisure area (Living room, living room and kitchen) We have a beautiful courtesy toilet, (Like everything in the house, it is designed and made to measure).The area leading to the bedrooms is divided by a door that gives us access to the rooms. There are two double rooms and one single, all of them with built-in wardrobes made to order.In the distributor of the bedrooms there is a large bathroom with a shower, the siute-type master bedroom has its own bathroom with a shower and a hydromassage bathtub, it should be noted that in said bedroom, both at the back of the headboard and at the foot of the bed there are two very large built-in wardrobes with large storage capacity.Central Heating, Hot water by Gas Boiler, The air conditioning through the house is divided into two different zones, each one with its own machine, One Zone is the Living Room and Kitchen and the other the Bedroom Zone.Large PVC windows, with tilt-and-turn thermal break, electric and domotic shutters, AUSTRIAN SOLID FLOOR of oiled oak glued to a level base to avoid creaking and movement.REPLACEMENT in kitchen with hydraulic floor, part of the original tile of the house (from 1930). The reform and its design have been a success, there are details such as some of the original steel columns of the building, which have been left in sight, which gives it even more charm if possible.Little to say about the area where the House is located, in the Plaza de Los Sitios, large green areas, all services at street level, shops and restaurants that will make life even more pleasant.The house has a comfortable storage room and a large garage with easy access. For more information, do not hesitate to contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Independencia, Zaragoza
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza de Los Sitios

description: Development of seven homes located at Calle Ángel Jaria number 29, next to Camino del Pilón, homes from 70 m² to 84 m², with a garage and storage room. Distributions to choose between 3 and 4 bedrooms, large private terraces of up to 60 m². The building is located in the central part of the Miralbueno neighborhood, between Calle Francisco Rallo Lahoz and Camino del Pilón. In this area of the city in full expansion you can find many natural areas, parks and squares. In the nearby area you can also find various educational facilities, sports or health centers, such as schools, institutes, nurseries, residences and sports centers. A perfect place to be surrounded by green areas, without losing the comforts of being in the urban center of Zaragoza. Homes of excellent quality, high energy efficiency, Energy Certification A, fully equipped and customizable. The building has three duplex penthouses with large terraces, two flats on the ground floor with terraces on both facades and two ground-floor apartments with large terraces inside. Prices include garage and storage room. Building surrounded by an envelope with high thermal capacities, Energy Certification A, state-of-the-art facilities through an aerothermal system and use of its own energy and mechanical ventilation with heat recovery. Carefully selected materials that guarantee the comfort of the home: underfloor heating and cooling with porcelain flooring, heat recovery, pre-installation of electric vehicle charging in the garage, and high-performance carpentry.

description: Do you want to live in a unique place? Do you want to have a house with a garden, private garage, cellar, common areas with a pool... ? Bebricio Real Estate recommends these 338 m2 of wonderful home distributed in four heights. On the ground floor, upon entering, the warm hall with a built-in wardrobe leads to a spectacular dining room. Large fully equipped kitchen with area to eat or enjoy long coffees, and a toilet. From the living room and the kitchen there is access to a beautiful and spacious porch with access to the private garden of about 45 meters and to the community area. On the first floor we find three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, the main one en suite and with access to a beautiful sun terrace, and two full bathrooms. On the ground floor we find a large attic with access to two terraces. On the lower floor there is parking for two large independent cars, a cellar with facilities and a space that can serve as a pantry, storage room, etc. Can you ask for more? Lots of extras and details: aluminum windows with double glazing, recently replaced individual gas heating with thermostat on each floor, pre-installation of ducted air conditioning, hardwood doors, wooden and ceramic floors, recently renovated kitchen with marble top.. . The area in which it is located is very quiet, very well connected, and close to all services: schools, supermarkets, medical center...

It does not have a kitchen installed since its current use is for an office, it has all the necessary sockets to convert it into a kitchen. With the reform, an armored entrance door was installed, the floors are Pergo, the doors are lacquered white, the exit doors to the balconies are all climalit with thermal and acoustic break, it has a hot/cold split both in the living room as in the bedroom and an integral enclosure of the terrace was carried out. description: The third phase of the Skyline promotion, Plaza Europa, which comprises a total of 29 new homes, is now available. Just 10 minutes from the Basilica del Pilar, in the Plaza de Europa, an unbeatable location, Skyline stands out as the new architectural icon of the city, a building for the future of Zaragoza today. The unique volume and the exceptional game of heights of Skyline places us in front of a work of art that offers an extra quality of life, multiple possibilities until now impossible: incredible views, spectacular common areas that look out over the river, large-area homes and terraces. in the best enclave of the city. Thus, Skyline brings together all the advantages of a consolidated downtown area: the best communications, although you can walk anywhere in the city center; all services and equipment (schools, health centers, sports facilities.. . ) and the best leisure offer to make the most of your free time. In addition, it is very close to the Grancasa shopping center and the Parque del Agua. Its avant-garde design has the stamp of the award-winning Aragonese architect Julio Clúa, in collaboration with Francisco ‘Patxi’ Mangado, one of the most relevant and recognized architects worldwide. Clúa and Mangado present us the insignia of the Zaragoza of the future, they open the doors to the new skyline of the city. The homes in this third phase have high quality standards and a minimalist atmosphere, a fully equipped kitchen, exclusive design bathrooms, built-in wardrobes, a laundry closet with a washing machine and a clothing cabinet in all models.. . The common areas have their own personality. Exclusivity, privacy, modernity, comfort.. . They are mentioned in them so that you can enjoy your favorite activities with the best views of the Ebro. A building for the future of Zaragoza today. Common zones: Glazed covered swimming pool · Gym · Large common area with privileged views of the river · Children's play areas · Lift Energy rating: A (Valid until 11/22/2031) Phase 3 key delivery date: April 2024 With garage and storage room included in the price. Feel the city at your feet.. . The new skyline begins at home. EBROSA, SA will adjust its performance and contracting to comply with the requirements established in Law 20/2015, the amounts anticipated by customers being endorsed.

The location is perfect, in a privileged area of Actur, just a few steps from the tram stop and close to Gran Casa. San Juan de Mozarrifar is a neighborhood of Zaragoza, with public transport, all kinds of shops with a supermarket, local shops, bars and cafes, a pharmacy.. . The urbanization has a good community area with swimming pool, green area and sports area, as well as a community room. The house is distributed as follows: STREET FLOOR: Spacious and modern living room with open kitchen, recently renovated. The kitchen was made with a good island, with a dining bar and an integrated hood in the design false ceiling. It has an area of about 45 square meters, and about 6 meters of windows towards the garden area, facing south and sun practically all day. From here we have access to the rear garden. A toilet completes this floor. YARD: We have a garden area, with trees and vegetation of about 45 meters. Here we have water intakes and drainage. FIRST FLOOR: On this floor we have 4 large bedrooms: * Main bedroom (suite type) of 12.45m and bathroom of more than 4 meters. * Secondary bedroom of almost 12 meters * Third bedroom of more than 13 meters * Fourth bedroom of more than 13 meters A second bathroom completes this floor. SECOND FLOOR: 66 meters diaphanous, with Velux type windows. Currently used as a guest room and office... but its large size allows many uses or even in the division. BASEMENT: On this floor we have a storage room of more than 11 meters and a large garage area of more than 38 meters in which two cars fit. The garage door is electric with remote control. The heating is individual, with electric underfloor heating, and temperature control by plants. There are several neighbors who have installed solar panels on their roofs. In the attic there is hot and cold air conditioning and accumulator. Community fees are only 20 euros / month. Do you want to live in this house? Don't get lost and call now!

description: Casa Audiencia is a residential building located in the center of Zaragoza, after La Audiencia, in the Historic Center. In the Plaza Ecce Hommo next to the University School of Tourism of Zaragoza, Casa Audiencia is located 5 minutes walk from the Plaza del Pilar and the Plaza España and 3 minutes from the Central Market and the Roman Walls. Casa Audiencia is located in the center of Zaragoza, in the tourist area par excellence, next to the most important and emblematic places of the city: The Basilica del Pilar, La Seo Cathedral, Alfonso Street or Paseo Independencia. Around the building you can find multiple shops, schools, entertainment venues and monuments among other elements, which make the location something exceptional. It should be noted the proximity of Casa Audiencia to the tram stop. You can't be better with the rest of the city and have better transportation than living in Casa Audiencia. The building consists of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes. It is equipped with a communal pool on the rooftop. Also available in the rooftop area, a common area ideal for organizing family meals or dinners outdoors. The homes will be fully equipped, will have a kitchen and bathrooms. As for the facilities, Casa Audiencia, has a high energy efficiency system (A) for maximum savings and also the homes have a ventilation system with heat recovery that provides a stable temperature. Casa Audiencia has storage rooms, and also parking spaces that allow its owners to park their car in the building itself, without having to search for alternative parking.

At Aqua Brisa you will enjoy the best homes in the Arcosur area, with great interior equipment and maximum energy efficiency -Passivhaus certification- to guarantee absolute comfort and enjoy a better quality of life. It will have a special community area in which the walking areas, the swimming pool and the children's play area stand out. You will live in an environment without worries and with quality of life! description: DOLCE VITA in miralbueno Edificio Dolce has been designed to project an expression of avant-garde materials: aluminum in caramel tones, large-format porcelain tiles that provide serenity and elegance, and a set of integrated LED lights to create different atmospheres. Our homes represent the future, open areas so that the whole family and friends can enjoy at the same time. Large terraces to enjoy dinner with friends. Kitchens with open format and design materials. We offer you different housing proposals, on the ground floor with a large terrace where you can disconnect from day to day, flats on the ground floor with a balanced design, penthouses distributed over two floors, with all the advantages of a single-family home, but at a higher cost. minimal maintenance. Location: Dolce Building enjoys a privileged location. Miralbueno has become a reference neighborhood for several years. description: Sale.Garrapinillos.Individual house with elevator to all floors.Detached villa located in one of the most valued streets in the Garrapinillos area.Approximate 500 square meters built on a large plot of 5,300 square meters with a fully consolidated garden, with large trees and elegant palm trees.The house has six bedrooms, three separate bathrooms.The master suite with access through the dressing room to a private bathroom with a round whirlpool tub. Perfect state.Independent single-family home that stands out for a very sensible and well-planned distribution based on large and well-interconnected spaces, with extraordinary qualities in its construction and design of the home that make it robust and exclusive. The entrance hall gives way to the different areas: Description by plants. Street level with main access and the pool terrace.70-meter room with dining area and seating area.2 bedrooms, office and bathroom, kitchen-dining room and access to the gazebo porch with access to the pool area facing South.A second distributor with a stairway to the upper floor and basement (a space different from the aforementioned Hall). Access to the elevator that leads to all floors.The upper floor houses 4 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms.The large-area bedroom has a large bathroom, dressing room, a long front of wardrobes and windows overlooking the pool area.Balcony overlooking the main entrance.The basement floor contains a leisure room with a traditionally designed wine cellar with a bar and capacity for more than 1,000 bottles. ￼ A Warehouse that acts as a pantry aid, has a large fireplace with independent draft and electric ventilation and woodshed under the stairs with a door.It has windows that provide it with exterior light.The house is located on a dominant plot of 5,300 square meters, facing south, excellent landscaping with large native tree species, swimming pool and porch with various environments.Fully upgraded facilities in 2013. Oil heating with cast iron radiators and split air conditioning).Both the heating boiler and the water and pool purification system are in a separate pit with access via a metal ladder. Warehouse Garage for six covered cars. Perimeter floor of the street between gardens and access to the garage with high-resistance concrete screed. Access by automatic door. Several advanced technology security systems. Climalit carpentry. Garrapinillos is probably the best-known urbanization with plots and independent chalets in Zaragoza.Garrapinillos is a rural neighborhood to the northwest of the Spanish municipality of Zaragoza, in the autonomous community of Aragón.It is governed by a neighborhood council.It is a residential neighborhood, in which urbanizations and farms abound, an area of 950 hectares.It has 1,050 independent homes on plots of 1,500, 2,500 and 10,000 m2 and 400 townhouses in 9 different developments.Both its strategic location - a stone's throw from the center of the capital (19 km) and a few kilometers from the airport - as well as its strict security measures and its many options for private schooling, leisure, sports and health, have made the municipality a benchmark residential in Zaragoza. His zip code is 50,190.

description: Continuing with our maxim of Water, Light and Life, Edificio Malui is born. A state-of-the-art building designed to make your day to day and that of your family a unique experience. Malui Building stands out for the quality of its common areas. A new concept of spaces for community use is developed on the ground floor and the covered floor. Inside the ground floor, the uses related to healthy living are developed: an equipped gym and a wellness area, and next to it, a fully equipped recreation area for holding all kinds of celebrations and friends' gatherings. The common use areas culminate on the roof of the building with a communal outdoor pool, the ideal place to enjoy a swim under the stars. Malui Building is made up of 19 homes with different types, you can find penthouses on the ground floor, duplex penthouses and apartments on the ground floor. All of them have the guarantee of being homes that present the highest category of energy efficiency. All homes have a garage and storage room in the building. Vehicles enter the garage through C / Santa Gema and there is a car lift inside. Finally, the proximity of green spaces where you can go for a walk or do sports in the open air, completes a space and an ideal environment for family living. In EDIFICIO MALUI less energy consumed means more comfort inside the house thanks to the air conditioning systems using underfloor heating and cooling by Saunier Duval Aerotermia and the controlled mechanical ventilation equipment with a heat recovery unit. Each house has an aerothermal heat pump equipment that converts energy into efficient air conditioning, thanks to the use of the energy contained in the air that surrounds us. The construction with sustainable equipment not only seeks the highest efficiency and performance of the facilities, but also the interior well-being of those who inhabit the space.

description: The new development of 17 homes Edificio Sol arises giving a facade to the green space between Camino de Fillas and Doctor Iranzo streets in the Las Fuentes neighborhood, a few meters from the Utrillas shopping center next to Miguel Servet street. A promotion for Houses for Sale Zaragoza that seeks to differentiate itself by offering great quality and design at the most competitive prices in the city. Edificio Sol is made up of two blocks of flats that can be accessed through Camino de Fillas street. In them, there is a wide range of different homes ranging from ground floors with large outdoor terraces, homes on raised floors with terraces and duplex penthouses with the possibility of a private pool on their upper terraces. 2 and 3 bedroom homes that make the most of their surface area. In addition, the building has 2 floors of underground parking with easy access, movement through the interior and private storage rooms. In it we find 18 large parking spaces, with the possibility of being doubles. The exterior design is inspired by the old Aragonese brick and wrought iron buildings that evoke an industrial style, which is transformed in a contemporary way to give a modern and timeless image that integrates perfectly with the environment. Its proximity to the Torre Ramona park, to C. D. M La Granja, to the Tomás Alvira school, to the I. AND. S Grande Covian, the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, the large number of nearby services that exist and its easy connection with the city center make Edificio Sol a perfect place to live in a quiet way and with a high level of quality of life.

description: Residencial Parque Canal is a promotion of 20 vacant homes with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with garages and storage rooms in the basement. In Residencial Parque Canal you will find ground floors with large patios, large terraces on the middle floors and penthouses with magnificent terraces, highlighting a spectacular communal area on the roof with a solarium, swimming pool and unique views over the Imperial Canal of Aragon to enjoy all year round. Residencial Parque Canal is located in a unique enclave in the city of Zaragoza, next to the new Valdefierro Park and the Imperial Canal, which makes it an oasis in the middle of natural spaces. All the houses have views of the Imperial Canal and enjoy spectacular light thanks to their large windows opening onto the green areas. All this, in an environment of new and modern constructions, but very close to consolidated urbanizations such as Torre Pajaritos, La Floresta or Montecanal, a few meters from the Green Corridor and a wide variety of shops and shopping centers, schools, sports centers and hospitals. and with excellent communication through Gomez Laguna Avenue and the Z-30 that allows us to access any point in the city in a few minutes. In addition, all the homes have AEROTHERMIA, through radiant-cooling floors, so you can enjoy maximum comfort in your new home, while achieving greater efficiency-energy savings and having more free space, compared to the traditional system. of radiators, improving the possibilities of interior decoration.

description: Low A: 70 m2 useful interior and 47 m2 of terrace. Exterior housing with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, living room and separate kitchen. 175,900, 00 NEW PROMOTION OF NEW WORK NEXT TO THE THIRD BELT Promotion of nine homes located on Calle La Joya number 16-18, next to Fourth Avenue and Third Belt, homes from 40 m² to 75 m², with storage room included and optional garage. Distributions to choose between 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms, extraordinary private terraces of up to 50 m². Homes with optional private pools. The building is located in the upper part of the Torrero-La Paz neighborhood, where a multitude of natural areas, parks and squares can be found on both banks of the Imperial Canal. In the nearby area you can also find various educational facilities, sports or health centers, such as schools, institutes, nurseries, residences and sports centers, both private and municipal. A perfect place to be surrounded by nature and green areas, without losing the comforts of being in the urban center of Zaragoza. The building has good communication by road, through Fourth Avenue, America Avenue, Paseo Cuellar and Paseo Colón, which communicate with the city center and the third ring road. There are also different public transport stops that communicate with the entire city. Homes of excellent quality, high energy efficiency, Energy Certification A, fully equipped and customizable. The building has four duplex penthouses with large terraces, three apartments on the first floor with terraces on both facades and two ground floor apartments with large terraces inside. Prices include storage room, garage is optional. Building surrounded by an envelope with high thermal capacities, Energy Certification A, state-of-the-art facilities through an aerothermal system and use of its own energy and mechanical ventilation with heat recovery. Carefully selected materials that guarantee the comfort of the home: underfloor heating and cooling, heat recovery, pre-installation of electric vehicle charging in the garage, and high-performance carpentry.

description: The new development of 17 homes Edificio Sol arises giving a facade to the green space between Camino de Fillas and Doctor Iranzo streets in the Las Fuentes neighborhood, a few meters from the Utrillas shopping center next to Miguel Servet street. A promotion for Houses for Sale Zaragoza that seeks to differentiate itself by offering great quality and design at the most competitive prices in the city. Edificio Sol is made up of two blocks of flats that can be accessed through Camino de Fillas street. In them, there is a wide range of different homes ranging from ground floors with large outdoor terraces, homes on raised floors with terraces and duplex penthouses with the possibility of a private pool on their upper terraces. 2 and 3 bedroom homes that make the most of their surface area. In addition, the building has 2 floors of underground parking with easy access, movement through the interior and private storage rooms. In it we find 18 large parking spaces, with the possibility of being doubles. The exterior design is inspired by the old Aragonese brick and wrought iron buildings that evoke an industrial style, which is transformed in a contemporary way to give a modern and timeless image that integrates perfectly with the environment. Its proximity to the Torre Ramona park, to C. D. M La Granja, to the Tomás Alvira school, to the I. AND. S Grande Covian, the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, the large number of nearby services that exist and its easy connection with the city center make Edificio Sol a perfect place to live in a quiet way and with a high level of quality of life.

description: EL JUNCAL RESIDENCIAL, is an exclusive residential complex made up of 39 homes of meticulous and avant-garde design, whose objective is that their rooms and the life in them, be the center of everything. Thanks to its private gardens, the living space of each home is expanded and its possibilities of use multiplied. In addition, the residential has a swimming pool, children's play area and landscaped and wooded areas, which make up the green lung of the residential. Efficient architecture, design and spacious spaces, along with premium qualities, are some of the characteristics of LUJAMA homes. Maximum energy rating A, together with an original architectural design from the Architecture studio, Clua-Longas Arquitectos. All the details, both of the homes and the residential complex as a whole, have been thought out with dedication, elegance and exclusivity. A perfect example of sustainable and attractive single-family architecture, capable of offering you the lifestyle you were looking for. WHY CHOOSE THE JUNCAL? Residencial El Juncal, located in the most privileged environment of Cuarte de Huerva, is one of the best options to live in Aragon. Its location combines nature, tranquility, all in an exclusive area, with large green areas, places to connect with nature, without giving up the modernity and dynamism of the already consolidated services and public infrastructures that surround it. This enclave, of great natural value, is also fully equipped with schools, institutes, sports facilities, cultural and leisure centers, supermarkets, as well as direct and fast connections with the center of Zaragoza. The large green areas of the residential and the area give El Juncal a natural and quiet character, without giving up the urban. In short, El Juncal is a commitment to avant-garde architecture and energy efficiency, without giving up comfort, in a different natural space.

description: New construction Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte, Inmoguscoa From €160,000 Come meet your new home! Located in one of the best areas of Cuarte de Hueva, our new development offers 2, 3 and 4-bedroom homes with a community garden and pool, magnificent qualities, large terraces, and a garage and storage room included in the price. Inmoguscoa, S. TO. is an Aragonese developer that has been operating in the sector for more than 20 years, and undertakes this project hand in hand with PORCELANOSA, who signs all the flooring, wall tiles and bathroom fixtures for the homes, as well as BANKINTER as a financial institution. Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte has 14 homes of various types so that you can choose the one you like best and that best suits your needs. Ground floors with large gardens and a multipurpose cellar with an English patio with natural light and ventilation, intermediate floors with 2 and 3 bedrooms and duplex penthouses with large terraces. We offer different quality finishes for you to decide on the flooring of the house, bathrooms and kitchen (ecological materials, among others), as well as the possibility of electric vehicle charging in the parking space or the installation of a Wi-Fi thermostat. The kitchens are delivered fully equipped. In addition, an ETICS type façade has been designed, a construction system in which the insulation is carried out on the outside of the building envelope, this being the best solution to meet the requirements of the new CTE, eliminating the appearance of thermal bridges and condensation. , and by isolating the home, in a much more efficient and comfortable way from external climate changes, so that all homes contribute to caring for the environment, you will benefit from savings of approximately 40% in energy costs and greater well-being. The project includes aerothermal equipment, both for the production of DHW and for air conditioning through radiant-cooling floors, double-flow controlled mechanical ventilation with heat recovery and top-quality PVC exterior carpentry for the best thermal and acoustic behavior, which ultimate in energy efficient construction. If you are looking for a home to enjoy with the best qualities and the greatest comfort, make an appointment with us at our offices in Zaragoza, Avenida Tenor Fleta 9. Come visit us!

description: New construction Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte, Inmoguscoa From €160,000 Come meet your new home! Located in one of the best areas of Cuarte de Hueva, our new development offers 2, 3 and 4-bedroom homes with a community garden and pool, magnificent qualities, large terraces, and a garage and storage room included in the price. Inmoguscoa, S. TO. is an Aragonese developer that has been operating in the sector for more than 20 years, and undertakes this project hand in hand with PORCELANOSA, who signs all the flooring, wall tiles and bathroom fixtures for the homes, as well as BANKINTER as a financial institution. Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte has 14 homes of various types so that you can choose the one you like best and that best suits your needs. Ground floors with large gardens and a multipurpose cellar with an English patio with natural light and ventilation, intermediate floors with 2 and 3 bedrooms and duplex penthouses with large terraces. We offer different quality finishes for you to decide on the flooring of the house, bathrooms and kitchen (ecological materials, among others), as well as the possibility of electric vehicle charging in the parking space or the installation of a Wi-Fi thermostat. The kitchens are delivered fully equipped. In addition, an ETICS type façade has been designed, a construction system in which the insulation is carried out on the outside of the building envelope, this being the best solution to meet the requirements of the new CTE, eliminating the appearance of thermal bridges and condensation. , and by isolating the home, in a much more efficient and comfortable way from external climate changes, so that all homes contribute to caring for the environment, you will benefit from savings of approximately 40% in energy costs and greater well-being. The project includes aerothermal equipment, both for the production of DHW and for air conditioning through radiant-cooling floors, double-flow controlled mechanical ventilation with heat recovery and top-quality PVC exterior carpentry for the best thermal and acoustic behavior, which ultimate in energy efficient construction. If you are looking for a home to enjoy with the best qualities and the greatest comfort, make an appointment with us at our offices in Zaragoza, Avenida Tenor Fleta 9. Come visit us!

description: Casa Audiencia is a residential building located in the center of Zaragoza, after La Audiencia, in the Historic Center. In the Plaza Ecce Hommo next to the University School of Tourism of Zaragoza, Casa Audiencia is located 5 minutes walk from the Plaza del Pilar and the Plaza España and 3 minutes from the Central Market and the Roman Walls. Casa Audiencia is located in the center of Zaragoza, in the tourist area par excellence, next to the most important and emblematic places of the city: The Basilica del Pilar, La Seo Cathedral, Alfonso Street or Paseo Independencia. Around the building you can find multiple shops, schools, entertainment venues and monuments among other elements, which make the location something exceptional. It should be noted the proximity of Casa Audiencia to the tram stop. You can't be better with the rest of the city and have better transportation than living in Casa Audiencia. The building consists of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes. It is equipped with a communal pool on the rooftop. Also available in the rooftop area, a common area ideal for organizing family meals or dinners outdoors. The homes will be fully equipped, will have a kitchen and bathrooms. As for the facilities, Casa Audiencia, has a high energy efficiency system (A) for maximum savings and also the homes have a ventilation system with heat recovery that provides a stable temperature. Casa Audiencia has storage rooms, and also parking spaces that allow its owners to park their car in the building itself, without having to search for alternative parking.

description: Continuing with our maxim of Water, Light and Life, Edificio Malui is born. A state-of-the-art building designed to make your day to day and that of your family a unique experience. Malui Building stands out for the quality of its common areas. A new concept of spaces for community use is developed on the ground floor and the covered floor. Inside the ground floor, the uses related to healthy living are developed: an equipped gym and a wellness area, and next to it, a fully equipped recreation area for holding all kinds of celebrations and friends' gatherings. The common use areas culminate on the roof of the building with a communal outdoor pool, the ideal place to enjoy a swim under the stars. Malui Building is made up of 19 homes with different types, you can find penthouses on the ground floor, duplex penthouses and apartments on the ground floor. All of them have the guarantee of being homes that present the highest category of energy efficiency. All homes have a garage and storage room in the building. Vehicles enter the garage through C / Santa Gema and there is a car lift inside. Finally, the proximity of green spaces where you can go for a walk or do sports in the open air, completes a space and an ideal environment for family living. In EDIFICIO MALUI less energy consumed means more comfort inside the house thanks to the air conditioning systems using underfloor heating and cooling by Saunier Duval Aerotermia and the controlled mechanical ventilation equipment with a heat recovery unit. Each house has an aerothermal heat pump equipment that converts energy into efficient air conditioning, thanks to the use of the energy contained in the air that surrounds us. The construction with sustainable equipment not only seeks the highest efficiency and performance of the facilities, but also the interior well-being of those who inhabit the space.

description: The new development of 17 homes Edificio Sol arises giving a facade to the green space between Camino de Fillas and Doctor Iranzo streets in the Las Fuentes neighborhood, a few meters from the Utrillas shopping center next to Miguel Servet street. A promotion for Houses for Sale Zaragoza that seeks to differentiate itself by offering great quality and design at the most competitive prices in the city. Edificio Sol is made up of two blocks of flats that can be accessed through Camino de Fillas street. In them, there is a wide range of different homes ranging from ground floors with large outdoor terraces, homes on raised floors with terraces and duplex penthouses with the possibility of a private pool on their upper terraces. 2 and 3 bedroom homes that make the most of their surface area. In addition, the building has 2 floors of underground parking with easy access, movement through the interior and private storage rooms. In it we find 18 large parking spaces, with the possibility of being doubles. The exterior design is inspired by the old Aragonese brick and wrought iron buildings that evoke an industrial style, which is transformed in a contemporary way to give a modern and timeless image that integrates perfectly with the environment. Its proximity to the Torre Ramona park, to C. D. M La Granja, to the Tomás Alvira school, to the I. AND. S Grande Covian, the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, the large number of nearby services that exist and its easy connection with the city center make Edificio Sol a perfect place to live in a quiet way and with a high level of quality of life.
