description: EL JUNCAL RESIDENCIAL, is an exclusive residential complex made up of 39 homes of meticulous and avant-garde design, whose objective is that their rooms and the life in them, be the center of everything. Thanks to its private gardens, the living space of each home is expanded and its possibilities of use multiplied. In addition, the residential has a swimming pool, children's play area and landscaped and wooded areas, which make up the green lung of the residential. Efficient architecture, design and spacious spaces, along with premium qualities, are some of the characteristics of LUJAMA homes. Maximum energy rating A, together with an original architectural design from the Architecture studio, Clua-Longas Arquitectos. All the details, both of the homes and the residential complex as a whole, have been thought out with dedication, elegance and exclusivity. A perfect example of sustainable and attractive single-family architecture, capable of offering you the lifestyle you were looking for. WHY CHOOSE THE JUNCAL? Residencial El Juncal, located in the most privileged environment of Cuarte de Huerva, is one of the best options to live in Aragon. Its location combines nature, tranquility, all in an exclusive area, with large green areas, places to connect with nature, without giving up the modernity and dynamism of the already consolidated services and public infrastructures that surround it. This enclave, of great natural value, is also fully equipped with schools, institutes, sports facilities, cultural and leisure centers, supermarkets, as well as direct and fast connections with the center of Zaragoza. The large green areas of the residential and the area give El Juncal a natural and quiet character, without giving up the urban. In short, El Juncal is a commitment to avant-garde architecture and energy efficiency, without giving up comfort, in a different natural space.

description: RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE, is a unique residential complex made up of 65 exclusive homes, within a gated community with private access control. WHAT ARE THEIR CHARACTERISTICS? The urbanization has more than 3.000 m2 of green areas with lots of trees and gardening, a children's area and a swimming pool for adults and children. The residential complex will also have a coworking room-gastroteca and gym, with access to a picnic area with a pergola. The 3 and 4 bedroom homes, large living rooms and spacious terraces where you can enjoy the tranquility and comfort of your new home with your family, are characterized by their excellent double orientation and magnificent views of the natural environment that surrounds the residential area. The ground floors with a garden and the penthouses with a private solarium are undoubtedly the most outstanding homes in the residential area. WHY CHOOSE MONTEVERDE? The reasons for choosing Monteverde apart from the characteristics of the homes themselves are: Energy efficiency, sustainability, the highest qualities in thermal and acoustic insulation are some of the characteristics of LUJAMA homes. All of this allows us to achieve the highest energy rating A, all backed by a modern architectural design by one of the most prestigious architectural firms in Zaragoza, Clua-Longas Arquitectos. One of the highlights of RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE is its excellent location. Its fast accessibility, with direct connections to the center of Zaragoza and the Z-40 make this modern residential the best located in the town. The environment is equipped with commercial areas, with multiple supermarkets, sports facilities, cultural centers, schools, as well as the variety and breadth of green areas where you can walk and play sports, make RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE the ideal place for a family like yours.

description: Torre Zaragoza, in the tallest skyscraper in the Aragonese capital. Useful area of 105.80m2 plus a large terrace of 27.70m2 Excellent qualities: An individual aerothermal system has been planned for each dwelling using a state-of-the-art heat to produce underfloor heating in winter, refrigeration by cooling floor in summer and domestic hot water throughout year. Aerothermal energy is the technology that uses the energy contained in the air in the form of temperature, which is why it is considered an energy from renewable sources, achieving a energy savings of up to 65% and also being a sustainable system that does not emit fumes. Imitation wood ceramic flooring, bathrooms and kitchen from the prestigious firm PORCELANOSA. Built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms dressed internally. Community areas: Gym Area In this area of the project we find an exclusive space.The dependence It has an air conditioning and lighting system.The floor of the room is a floating floor flooring in vaporized beech from the firm Tarkett.is teamed with different multifunction devices, bicycles, treadmills... All of the prestigious Technogym brand. Swimming pools Torre Zaragoza has two swimming pools.One located on the ground floor of the building and another on the 18th floor.Both are naturally integrated into the environment that surrounds them, since, by have a Finnish edge, they adapt perfectly to the environment and offer a feeling more integrated. Padel court and children's play area. description: New construction Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte, Inmoguscoa From €160,000 Come meet your new home! Located in one of the best areas of Cuarte de Hueva, our new development offers 2, 3 and 4-bedroom homes with a community garden and pool, magnificent qualities, large terraces, and a garage and storage room included in the price. Inmoguscoa, S. TO. is an Aragonese developer that has been operating in the sector for more than 20 years, and undertakes this project hand in hand with PORCELANOSA, who signs all the flooring, wall tiles and bathroom fixtures for the homes, as well as BANKINTER as a financial institution. Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte has 14 homes of various types so that you can choose the one you like best and that best suits your needs. Ground floors with large gardens and a multipurpose cellar with an English patio with natural light and ventilation, intermediate floors with 2 and 3 bedrooms and duplex penthouses with large terraces. We offer different quality finishes for you to decide on the flooring of the house, bathrooms and kitchen (ecological materials, among others), as well as the possibility of electric vehicle charging in the parking space or the installation of a Wi-Fi thermostat. The kitchens are delivered fully equipped. In addition, an ETICS type façade has been designed, a construction system in which the insulation is carried out on the outside of the building envelope, this being the best solution to meet the requirements of the new CTE, eliminating the appearance of thermal bridges and condensation. , and by isolating the home, in a much more efficient and comfortable way from external climate changes, so that all homes contribute to caring for the environment, you will benefit from savings of approximately 40% in energy costs and greater well-being. The project includes aerothermal equipment, both for the production of DHW and for air conditioning through radiant-cooling floors, double-flow controlled mechanical ventilation with heat recovery and top-quality PVC exterior carpentry for the best thermal and acoustic behavior, which ultimate in energy efficient construction. If you are looking for a home to enjoy with the best qualities and the greatest comfort, make an appointment with us at our offices in Zaragoza, Avenida Tenor Fleta 9. Come visit us!

It is an easily accessible and well-connected neighborhood because, despite not having a tram, it has multiple connections with the rest of the city through urban buses and bicycles, not to mention the proximity to the Delicias Station. which allows diverse connections throughout the national territory. We are facing three unique homes, one per floor: The first house has 51.46 useful meters distributed in a bathroom, two bedrooms, a living room-kitchen, as well as a 20.17-meter terrace and a very spacious 20-meter cellar. House number two has 41.82 useful meters made up of a bathroom, two bedrooms, a kitchen-living room, a 19.22-meter terrace, as well as a 16.77-meter cellar. The third house is a duplex of 56.39 meters distributed between a bathroom, two bedrooms, living room, kitchen and a solarium of 42.66 meters. In addition, it has a fairly large storage room with 8.76 meters. The houses are equipped with excellent air conditioning and ventilation through aerothermal technology called Hydrokit. These are homes designed for the future with a more human scale and buildings that achieve a natural balance of Life with Nature. description: RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE, is a unique residential complex made up of 65 exclusive homes, within a gated community with private access control. WHAT ARE THEIR CHARACTERISTICS? The urbanization has more than 3.000 m2 of green areas with lots of trees and gardening, a children's area and a swimming pool for adults and children. The residential complex will also have a coworking room-gastroteca and gym, with access to a picnic area with a pergola. The 3 and 4 bedroom homes, large living rooms and spacious terraces where you can enjoy the tranquility and comfort of your new home with your family, are characterized by their excellent double orientation and magnificent views of the natural environment that surrounds the residential area. The ground floors with a garden and the penthouses with a private solarium are undoubtedly the most outstanding homes in the residential area. WHY CHOOSE MONTEVERDE? The reasons for choosing Monteverde apart from the characteristics of the homes themselves are: Energy efficiency, sustainability, the highest qualities in thermal and acoustic insulation are some of the characteristics of LUJAMA homes. All of this allows us to achieve the highest energy rating A, all backed by a modern architectural design by one of the most prestigious architectural firms in Zaragoza, Clua-Longas Arquitectos. One of the highlights of RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE is its excellent location. Its fast accessibility, with direct connections to the center of Zaragoza and the Z-40 make this modern residential the best located in the town. The environment is equipped with commercial areas, with multiple supermarkets, sports facilities, cultural centers, schools, as well as the variety and breadth of green areas where you can walk and play sports, make RESIDENCIAL MONTEVERDE the ideal place for a family like yours.

description: New construction Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte, Inmoguscoa From €160,000 Come meet your new home! Located in one of the best areas of Cuarte de Hueva, our new development offers 2, 3 and 4-bedroom homes with a community garden and pool, magnificent qualities, large terraces, and a garage and storage room included in the price. Inmoguscoa, S. TO. is an Aragonese developer that has been operating in the sector for more than 20 years, and undertakes this project hand in hand with PORCELANOSA, who signs all the flooring, wall tiles and bathroom fixtures for the homes, as well as BANKINTER as a financial institution. Residencial Terrazas de Cuarte has 14 homes of various types so that you can choose the one you like best and that best suits your needs. Ground floors with large gardens and a multipurpose cellar with an English patio with natural light and ventilation, intermediate floors with 2 and 3 bedrooms and duplex penthouses with large terraces. We offer different quality finishes for you to decide on the flooring of the house, bathrooms and kitchen (ecological materials, among others), as well as the possibility of electric vehicle charging in the parking space or the installation of a Wi-Fi thermostat. The kitchens are delivered fully equipped. In addition, an ETICS type façade has been designed, a construction system in which the insulation is carried out on the outside of the building envelope, this being the best solution to meet the requirements of the new CTE, eliminating the appearance of thermal bridges and condensation. , and by isolating the home, in a much more efficient and comfortable way from external climate changes, so that all homes contribute to caring for the environment, you will benefit from savings of approximately 40% in energy costs and greater well-being. The project includes aerothermal equipment, both for the production of DHW and for air conditioning through radiant-cooling floors, double-flow controlled mechanical ventilation with heat recovery and top-quality PVC exterior carpentry for the best thermal and acoustic behavior, which ultimate in energy efficient construction. If you are looking for a home to enjoy with the best qualities and the greatest comfort, make an appointment with us at our offices in Zaragoza, Avenida Tenor Fleta 9. Come visit us!

description: INDIQA SERVICIOS INMOBILIARIOS, offers you a pre-owned apartment in a residential area located next to Alcampo, in one of the main streets of the Valdefierro neighborhood. The 101 m2 built house has a hall with a built-in wardrobe, 3 bedrooms, 2 of them double with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped independent kitchen, a gallery and a 13.93-meter terrace. In addition, it has the use and enjoyment of a LARGE TERRACE of 60 meters, which you can distribute in several rooms, with direct access from the living room and the kitchen. The apartment has very good qualities: wooden floor, oak doors and PVC windows with double glazing and mosquito nets. It has air conditioning throughout the house with hot and cold pump, individual gas heating and armored front door. Large garage and storage. Zero level elevator. The farm has adapted access for people with reduced mobility. It has common recreational areas and a playground, ideal for children to play. Bus stop at the door. Apartment in perfect condition, READY TO MOVE IN!

address: Calle Baleares con c/ polígono no number
description: RESIDENCIAL BALEARES, in Casetas, is a unique residential complex made up of 62 exclusive homes, within a gated community with a spectacular landscaped communal area with swimming pool and children's play area. WHAT ARE THEIR CHARACTERISTICS? It consists of 2 and 3-bedroom homes, whose fundamental characteristic is the spaciousness of spaces with fully equipped kitchens and large living rooms, comfortable and practical bedrooms, but above all large terraces, where you can enjoy your new home with your family or friends. One of the most remarkable elements of the residential area is its spectacular common area, fully equipped with green areas and a swimming pool where you can cool off in summer. The homes, equipped with great luminosity thanks to a careful avant-garde and original design, offer in their interior high levels of material finishes, so that they are cozy, attractive and efficient. All the homes have been designed with an open and versatile design, which allows to achieve different spaces that satisfy different personal tastes and adapt to different styles of decoration. All the houses have spacious terraces and the attics have suggestive solariums. The previous of the house includes garage and storage room inside the residential. LOCATION AND SERVICES Residencial Baleares homes are located in a strategic and privileged location within Casetas, with all the equipment and services around, which makes this residential a unique place to live, since it is surrounded by the best educational, cultural, sports, leisure and shopping that the town offers. Its short distance to transport, both by road and by Cercanías with Zaragoza, make it a perfectly connected residential with its immediate surroundings. Either by bus, train, bicycle or by car, Residencial Baleares offers the best connections and transport possibilities. The area is fully equipped and surrounded by the most important public facilities of Casetas. On one side, just a few meters away are the health center, the Angel Sanz Briz Secondary Education Institute, the Azucarera park, the Cercanías station with fast connections to Zaragoza and Utebo, the Casetas municipal sports center and together to him, the next new Ricardo Mur school.

description: BRAND NEW! Semi-detached house with avant-garde design and luxury finishes with large private spaces with a communal pool and playground. It incorporates underfloor heating/refreshing combined with aerothermal energy, which provides it with high energy performance, achieving significant energy savings. This combination of systems brings together the advantages of both the good efficiency of the aerothermal heat pump and the pleasant distribution of heat from the underfloor heating/cooling system. It also has the pre-installation of solar panels on the roof. Closed useful area of 154 square meters distributed in 5 bedrooms, living room-kitchen, laundry room, two bathrooms, a toilet and a double closed garage with individual motorized blinds. It has an individual rear garden facing south of about 45 m2 (with direct access to the large private spaces with swimming pool and children's play area), south-facing terrace of 5 square meters and a gazebo area on the side of the house under a pergola. In bathrooms, porcelain stoneware floors, countertop sink furniture and double drawer with black taps, resin shower trays flush with the porcelain stoneware floor with screen and shower column also in black. Fully equipped kitchen with island/waterfall with skirt and porcelain worktop between the base and wall units and a black pool under the worktop from the Nodor brand. Balay brand appliances (8 kg washing machine, built-in dishwasher, induction hob, oven tower and microwave) with LG brand American double fridge. Inclined decorative hood of the Mepamsa brand. Installation of osmosis in the laundry room. Pre-installation of ducted air conditioning throughout the house. Come see it, you will love it!

description: Spectacular home in the best and most demanded area of Zaragoza. Madre Vedruna street next to San Sebastián square. Stately estate with several elevators and forklifts. Access for people with reduced mobility. Concierge service. Facade and roofs recently renovated. Very good community. The house is located on the sixth floor so it is very bright and quiet, with cross ventilation. Oil central heating with individual meter and cast iron radiators. Completely renovated with quality materials. Renewed electrical installation, climalit tilt-and-turn windows, interior wood carpentry, video intercom, armored door, oak parquet floors with recently stabbed herringbone pattern, smoothed walls. Currently it is used as an office, so the kitchen and the main bathroom were cancelled, but all the sockets were respected and preserved, so they can easily reoccupy their original space. There are four large bedrooms plus a large living room, the house has several reform options but simply installing the kitchen to your liking and the main bathroom, it is an impressive family home with all the comforts. The price includes a storage room in the same building. Possibility of garage in nearby farms. Do not miss the opportunity to live in the best of the city. Call us and we will arrange a visit. PURCHASE EXPENSES AND AGENCY FEES NOT INCLUDED.
